story:
Introduction

Welcome to my debut Kickstarter campaign! I present you a number of high-quality miniatures for space-themed tabletop games. These are flagships of various races that take into account their features in their design. You can view the entire line of ships of one of the races and download two free ships here.

If you want to know the whole background of my work and what it is inspired by then look here and here.

** PLEASE NOTE - This project is for digital files (STLs) to make all these items on your own home 3D printer - these are not physical goods **

The Sculpts of the Core Set

This includes four flagships. In the video above, I tried to point out all the features of the races that they represent. You can view them on pause. I think it's quite informative :)

All files are checked by printing on a photopolymer printer. The files can be used for your personal use only. No molds, sell, mass production etc.

** NOTE - You can try using thumbnails in Tabletop Simulator. I haven't tried it myself. I can't give you any advice or guarantees about their work. **

What are the advantages of choosing STL files?

  • No unnecessary packaging
  • No delivery times
  • No shipping costs
  • No customs fees
  • No lost package
  • Print your files as much as you need
  • Play and play again by completing all your favorite board games, miniatures and role-playing games!  

The mercenary community was formed from ex-criminals, convicts, and adventurers. Their pirate fleets terrify traders and small settlements. Thanks to racial technologies, they collect goods after a battle and repair their ships from destroyed ships in the same place. When creating the flagship, I used the outline of the Galleon* (in the image below) which indicates that he belongs to the pirates. And also added extendable manipulators that can collect goods and repair ships. 

All files are checked by printing on a photopolymer printer. The files can be used for your personal use only. No molds, sell, mass production etc. 

Beings made up of energy. For materialization, they use an exoskeleton-armor covered with runic ligature. Because of this, they look like knights and use an energy spear. They move with the help of anti-grav that gives the movement a sliding effect. On the front armor, near the navel, there is - Last Breath - a sphincter through which the Ghost infantryman can make the last suicide attack due to his own energy.

In the miniature, an infantryman leans on the severed manipulator of an enemy of an alien race in a victorious pose. The miniature consists of two parts: the base and the body. Size: 32 mm. 

All files are checked by printing on a photopolymer printer. The files can be used for your personal use only. No molds, sell, mass production etc. 

A race of diplomats and thinkers. Themselves a friendly people, they have been attacked by other races more than once. Therefore, they have a strong fleet and developed technologies. They try to solve all problems with other races through diplomacy and propaganda. If this does not work, then technology comes into play. Their flagship has a weapon that can shoot at neighboring systems and technological fields that stop the enemy.

All files are checked by printing on a photopolymer printer. The files can be used for your personal use only. No molds, sell, mass production etc. 

An amazing race developed on a volcanic planet. They possess unique physiology and technologies. Their ships are able to move and stay in star systems with a supernova. The volcanic race creates huge ships that have shipyards (solar forges) on their Board. The race flagship has powerful armament and armor and can also produce cruisers. 

All files are checked by printing on a photopolymer printer. The files can be used for your personal use only. No molds, sell, mass production etc. ​

Risks & Challenges

All of the STL files for the core package have been completed so there are no concerns regarding the files.

This is my first kickstarter, so there will be some unfamiliarity with the process but I will be working hard to ensure that I solve any problems as they arise.

All files were checked and printed.

story: RETAILERS: If you are interested in having CULTivate on your shelves, please send an email to info@popsbejou.com.

story:
Painting Zombies, orks, robots and all kind of monsters from a nightmare can be a lot of fun ! To paint miniatures, you need a Wet Palette to keep your paint moisturised. Today there is no straight forward solution on the market. That's why we created Everlasting Wet Palette, with best in class hydration system and easy to use and to carry airtight case. 

It's actually so good that it is approved by Pro Painters all around the world

With Everlasting Wet Palette, you will save your acrylic paint, save your time and be able to master painting techniques like a pro. Stand back, relax and focus on what's important: enjoying your painting sessions.

 

 

  

Because acrylic paint dry really really fast! So fast, you can't even take a short break or perform advanced techniques !  Everlasting wet palette is a must-have to enjoy your painting session :

  • Save paint: the paint won't dry out during your painting session
  • Start and stop at will: you can stop painting for a few minutes, hours or days, and find again workable paints when you come back
  • Achieve advanced technics: thanks to Everlasting stable hydration system, and our smooth surface, you will be able to perform advanced technics like Glaze, Gradients, Blending, 2 Brush Blending
  • And it's easy to use: it works straight out of the box, and the case, wells and brush holders were designed for your to enjoy your miniature painting!

 

Painter (5,9" x 7,9"): easy to store and carry, small to medium working space

Studio (7,9" x 11,8"): extra large for Pros and Enthusiasts, medium to large working space

 

 

  • No bleeding
  • No drying
  • No overflowing
  • Perfect to master advanced painting techniques

 

 Your paint stays wet for hours when working, for days if you close the lid! You can stop and start your painting session at will.

  • Mold resistant foam
  • Hydration paper sheets cut to dimensions 
  • Resistant hydration paper

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 


 For your inks, ultra high dilutions and other nasty stuffs. Wavy was designed to have a small foot print  

  

 

 

 

At the last stage of the Everlasting Wet Palette development, we sent prototypes to dozens of independent reviewers. The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, and we have also been able to incorporate a lot of suggestions from them into our design! But don't just take our word for it:

See reviews on our website !

SHOSHIES MINIS : " I will definitely buy one of those"  

SPIKEYBITS : " I will keep it on my desk"   

GEEKDAD : "you'll love the thought that has gone into the product and find it improves your painting experience too"  

NEXT LEVEL PAINTING : "I am not a wet palette guy, but I was pretty impressed!"  

MAGABOTATO : " Foam and paper works perfectly for me"

FIGUREMENTORS : "I have been very impressed with the prototype and these could be the next BIG thing"

(Please note that we did not and will never pay for reviews.)

  • Paint stays moist and stable for hours and days
  • Hydration system is easy to setup and prevents bad smells
  • The unique case is easy to use with perfect dimensions
  • Everlasting Wet Palette is leak resistant, easily portable and made of solid materials
  • Wavy design brush holder and well palette magnet accessory
  • Engineered to the last details
  • Your paint dilution will stay stable during your painting session for hours. The paint will not bleed and will not dry. The perfect hydration will help you master the painting techniques like a pro. This cannot be reproduced without our paper and foam.
  • If you close the lid the paint will stay fresh for days.
  • All this right out of the box
  • Our foam holds a lot of water compared to its size ! The final foam will be thicker than the one used during reviews and reaches 3.5mm for improved hydration while retaining the same quality.
  • Our special foam is naturally mold resistant. No anti-mold chemicals are added to the foam, and the effect will not wear out over time. So no bad smell after a few days, even when not stored in a fridge. Long lasting, you just need to rinse it from time to time with fresh water.
  • Our paper is the perfect match for our foam. It sticks on it, and does not create bubbles. 100% of the paper is in contact with the foam, for perfect hydration. It will not curl after the easy setup. It was particularly selected to offer the best performance with hobby paints and level of dilution used in hobby painting.
  • Machine cut to exact dimensions, taking into account the swell effect due to the water contact
  • The overall color is neutral, light gray, so that you can paint with "true colours"

We designed Everlasting Wet Palette with perfect dimensions :

  • For easy access. 
  • Low raise
  • Compact foot print.

2 sizes are available to cater to different needs : 

  • Painter size, 15 by 20 cm (5,9" x 7,9"), made for miniature painters looking for a good sized palette, that is compact and easy to carry. It's perfect for small to medium sized paint stations. Painter Everlasting Wet Palette can be extended using the top lid as a side Palette.
  • Studio size, 20 by 30 cm (7,9" x 11,8"), made for Pros and Enthusiasts looking for a huge painting area. It's perfect for medium to large sized paint stations. Studio Everlasting Wet Palette can also be extended using the top lid as a side Palette.

 

When we built Everlasting Wet Palette we decided to make it :

  • Airtight, and leak resistant. We selected a TPE seal for its durability and so that it is easily operable.
  • Also, the hydration system is really stable and does not move during transport, as the foam sticks to the case naturally. 
  • The provided strap also contributes to making Everlasting Wet Palette a great palette to move around. The strap selected will be durable, made of Polyamide.
  • Finally, we selected strong, high quality ABS plastics for its durability and stability.

Wavy is the first magnet accessory available for Everlasting Wet Palette. We wanted to reinvent the way people use wells in miniature painting, by deciding on a compact size, but yet stable system thanks to the magnet. That way you can paint without fearing of hitting your wells and without consuming too much space for them. We then associated it with a brush holder. 

Wavy can be attached to your case in no time to the front, back, left or right side of the palette.

At RedgrassGames we pay a lot of importance to details, so that we obtain a perfect product at the end. For instance : 

  • The top lid can be stored under the bottom case
  • Draft angles of case and Wavy are adjusted for perfect match 
  • Feet are optimised for easy elastic setup...
story_txt:
Everlasting Wet Palette: A must have for miniature painters
Painting Zombies, orks, robots and all kind of monsters from a nightmare can be a lot of fun ! To paint miniatures, you need a Wet Palette to keep your paint moisturised. Today there is no straight forward solution on the market. That's why we created Everlasting Wet Palette, with best in class hydration system and easy to use and to carry airtight case. 
It's actually so good that it is approved by Pro Painters all around the world
With Everlasting Wet Palette, you will save your acrylic paint, save your time and be able to master painting techniques like a pro. Stand back, relax and focus on what's important: enjoying your painting sessions.

 

 

  

Because acrylic paint dry really really fast! So fast, you can't even take a short break or perform advanced techniques !  Everlasting wet palette is a must-have to enjoy your painting session :


Save paint: the paint won't dry out during your painting session

Start and stop at will: you can stop painting for a few minutes, hours or days, and find again workable paints when you come back

Achieve advanced technics: thanks to Everlasting stable hydration system, and our smooth surface, you will be able to perform advanced technics like Glaze, Gradients, Blending, 2 Brush Blending

And it's easy to use: it works straight out of the box, and the case, wells and brush holders were designed for your to enjoy your miniature painting!


 

Painter (5,9" x 7,9"): easy to store and carry, small to medium working space
Studio (7,9" x 11,8"): extra large for Pros and Enthusiasts, medium to large working space

 

 


No bleeding
No drying
No overflowing
Perfect to master advanced painting techniques


 

 Your paint stays wet for hours when working, for days if you close the lid! You can stop and start your painting session at will.


Mold resistant foam
Hydration paper sheets cut to dimensions 
Resistant hydration paper


 

 

 

 

  
 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 For your inks, ultra high dilutions and other nasty stuffs. Wavy was designed to have a small foot print  

  

 

 

 
At the last stage of the Everlasting Wet Palette development, we sent prototypes to dozens of independent reviewers. The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, and we have also been able to incorporate a lot of suggestions from them into our design! But don't just take our word for it:
See reviews on our website !
SHOSHIES MINIS : " I will definitely buy one of those"  
SPIKEYBITS : " I will keep it on my desk"   
GEEKDAD : "you'll love the thought that has gone into the product and find it improves your painting experience too"  
NEXT LEVEL PAINTING : "I am not a wet palette guy, but I was pretty impressed!"  
MAGABOTATO : " Foam and paper works perfectly for me"
FIGUREMENTORS : "I have been very impressed with the prototype and these could be the next BIG thing"
(Please note that we did not and will never pay for reviews.)


Paint stays moist and stable for hours and days
Hydration system is easy to setup and prevents bad smells

The unique case is easy to use with perfect dimensions
Everlasting Wet Palette is leak resistant, easily portable and made of solid materials

Wavy design brush holder and well palette magnet accessory
Engineered to the last details



Your paint dilution will stay stable during your painting session for hours. The paint will not bleed and will not dry. The perfect hydration will help you master the painting techniques like a pro. This cannot be reproduced without our paper and foam.
If you close the lid the paint will stay fresh for days.
All this right out of the box



Our foam holds a lot of water compared to its size ! The final foam will be thicker than the one used during reviews and reaches 3.5mm for improved hydration while retaining the same quality.
Our special foam is naturally mold resistant. No anti-mold chemicals are added to the foam, and the effect will not wear out over time. So no bad smell after a few days, even when not stored in a fridge. Long lasting, you just need to rinse it from time to time with fresh water.
Our paper is the perfect match for our foam. It sticks on it, and does not create bubbles. 100% of the paper is in contact with the foam, for perfect hydration. It will not curl after the easy setup. It was particularly selected to offer the best performance with hobby paints and level of dilution used in hobby painting.
Machine cut to exact dimensions, taking into account the swell effect due to the water contact
The overall color is neutral, light gray, so that you can paint with "true colours"

For easy access. 
Low raise
Compact foot print.

story:
Introducing Glow Doodle 101

Glow Doodle 101 is an educational board-game kit for teachers to deploy STEM coding activities in classroom.

In the race to obtain rare elements like the shiny “Glowium”,  students play the role of voyagers. Their mission is to control Glow  Doodle Rocket to venture through space and collect precious elements  ahead of other voyagers.

The game rules have been designed carefully to make learning  coding concepts much more fun and easier for even young beginners (aged  6+). The game kit has also been designed with tangible play-based  learning & experiential learning in mind.

 

Why Learning Coding Concepts Through Playing Physical Board Games?

While teaching coding concepts in traditional way and practicing  on tablets are appropriate for higher grade students, coding concepts  are sometimes too abstract for young beginners to learn this way.  

Learning through playing physically tangible board games has the following benefits:

  • Less screen time
  • More engaging
  • More effective learning by relating abstract concepts to play experience

 

Play Based & Experiential Learning

Play based learning & experiential learning have been proven to let  children engage more actively in learning. Experiential learning also  allows students to more easily grasp basic but new concepts.

 

Engaging Experience

The purposes of the space adventure theme & eye catching game  elements in Glow Doodle 101 is to stimulate students' curiosity and  motivation to participate.

 

Multi-Player Game Play (2-4 Players)

The multi-player game play design is another important factor for an engaging learning experience.

The  slight competitiveness between peers and the need to help one another  adhere to the game rules naturally stimulate active thinking and  involvement during the learning process.

 

Teacher Guide*

Glow Doodle 101 also includes teacher guide to help teachers to:

  • deploy 3 progressive levels of STEM coding activities in classroom
  • guide students to associate their gaming experience with particular coding concepts & knowledge associated with each of the 3 game plays 

End game criteria can sometimes be adjusted for better time management in classroom.

 

Three Game Plays in One Single Kit

There are 3 game plays in one single kit, which progressively introduce coding concepts to students. 

 

Glow Doodle 101 is Brought to Life Already

Glow Doodle 101 was successfully funded thanks to our supporters. Yes, it's ready to ship once you placed your order!

 

 

*Environmentally Friendly

Please note that Glow Doodle 101 has 3 Game Instructions with Teacher Guide. In order to protect the environment, game documents including Game Instructions & Teacher Guides will be delivered to you as electronic version. A Getting Started Guide will be included with the game kit.

story:
Risks & Challenges

There isn't a real risk. If we don't reach the goal of this campaign - I'll most likely won't be able to pay the production company to make the game. The minimum amount of boxes to be produced is 1500, though the goal that I'm aiming for is 2000 boxes.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are several ways you can help. Some of them are completely free - it's as easy as sharing this campaign on your social media, or just telling about it to your friends. Heck, you can even tell about it to your enemies. Strangers. Pets. Get the word out!

You may also consider supporting the project by selecting the "Benedicere" perk, that both helps me gather funds and gets you a neat poster to hang in the room you don't want kids to come in ever.

See you at the top of the mountain!

Artiom.

story:
Important news please note!

Hey everyone, due to my carelessness, I didn't consider the high marketing cost of the crowdfunding campaign. I can't afford it anymore. After careful consideration, I will give up this campaign.

Please select all current backer refund, indiegogo will give you a refund.

In the future, I will no longer use crowdfunding, but will directly use the myminifactory store for sales. The price will also be adjusted, but the previous supporters don’t have to worry about your rights and interests. I will provide the best discounts on future products. Send the code to you.

I'm really sorry, if you guys are willing to give another chance, the following is my myminifactory page. here

You can follow me, I will relaunch "1994 City" in the near future.

"1994 City" is a set of building terrains for 28/32 mm scale tabletop war games that allow players to remove or replace its wall quick and easy.

Players can remove the walls of these building terrains to place or grab their miniatures, without removing the floor of the building.

By switching between different walls, billboards, doors and windows, players can build terrains of different sizes and appearances, creating a diverse cityscape.

 

Specifications

Each floor of the “1994 City” building is 75 mm (3") in hight, and can be outfitted with walls of five different width: 50 mm(2"), 75 mm(3"), 100 mm(4"), 125 mm(5"), 150 mm(6").

The roads can be connected together by using the connecting component in the kit, or by inserting magnets in holes on each side.

 

Assemble the building

You might be wondering why the buildings need to be in so many components. This is done on purpose for ease of printing process and to reduce the operating time of your machine, resulting in a higher rate of success in printing this set.

 

Printable content

Add-ons

To learn more about "C Pipe", please click here.

 

Stretch goals

 

 

If you have any questions about 1994 City,

Check out the Facebook Group.

 

 

Risks and challenges

No risk, all reward. Almost every model is test printed and ready for delivery. I will continue printing and testing during the campaign. Stretch goal models will delivered in the order they are completed.

 

3d printing parameter reference

Print Settings:

Printer:  PING (DELTA Printer)，ENDER-3S

Nozzle Diameter: 0.4 mm

Primary Layer Height: 0.2 mm

Top/Bottom Solid: 4 

Outline/Perimeter Shells: 2

Infill Percentage: 10%

Outline Direction: Inside->Out

Supports: Yes

Max Overhang Angle: 60 deg

Heated Bed: Yes

story:
Corporate Times is a financially themed strategic game for 2-5 players, ages 10+. The game mechanics are a combination of worker placement and resource management, with a high level of player agency and involvement. Game duration is 60-90 minutes. 

The game gives a unique, behind-the-scenes glimpse of the business world that affects us all by revealing the powers that drive the markets and the whole economy. A dominant element of the business world is buying and selling stocks and assets, but the politic forces, the media and the banks will make this world much more challenging to navigate.

You are the head of a corporation. 

You wish to elevate your corporation to dominance over the entire state’s economy and now it is within reach. Smart investments will strengthen your influence over the economy and will increase your profits. Poor investments will hold you back and put the corporation in danger. The Media will bring you news of changes in the market status, but if you purchase Media Market Shares you can also control the news (to some extent). As your corporation holds more Market Shares, your influence over the economy grows. The first corporation to reach nation-wide dominance wins. 

Will it be you?

Corporate Times provides a deep yet easy-to-understand, entertaining insight of the modern business world and the powers which control it: politics, the media, and the banks. The media controls the news and decides on the agenda, including what to promote and what to hide from the public. Politics can strengthen the influence of your corporation on the economy. The Banks oversee the monetary flow and transactions, and controlling them allows better funding options. Each player builds his/her own corporation, navigating through the economy’s rules, and dealing with the 3 forces. The players need to use their assets, money and influence for one goal – to take over the economy.  

 

 

Corporate Times - Game SET UP

Your purpose is to dominate the nation's economy by accumulating 20 influence points. The board game simulates the economy of the state, divided into 11 different markets. Each market is constructed of a few market shares, open for investments by the players’ corporation. The participants set up a mega corporation that will attempt to dominate the state economy. Points are accumulated by the purchase of market shares and the use of news cards. Every market share has a value in influence points and income, and can be purchased in cash, by a bank loan, in a bidding war or by striking a deal between players. News cards are opened at the beginning of every turn and influence the game strategy.

​ The income and the influence points score of each player are marked on score tracks on the game board. After the purchase of a market share, the player will advance on these tracks according to the income and influence points attributed to the specific share. The news cards also have direct influence on the income, and might inforce you to change your immediate investment plans and long-term strategy.

 

 

How New Cards effect markets:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDWjMjdaYAM

 

 

Bidding war:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AkgUO4CbQU0

 

 

Purchase made via bank funding: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jqxYK3p9vEw

 

 

Full Game Playthrough:

Part one:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gybjlW1NHjk

 

Part Two:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F-AqXg2lxaM

 

Part Three:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CIpGrZ7sHQo

 

Part Four:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gAYIb6C8FZc

 

 

 

*** Please notice: All reviews were made on the prototype design. The campaign will finance design updated, as well as clarification of some rules ***

Tantrum House review

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5-cUs6ztDi0

 

Board Game Brawl review

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xncfCTLbgzI&amp...

 

 

Board to Death Reviews

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEQJdPikXI4

 

Risks and challenges

The factories are set and ready to start producing the game as soon as a successful campaign comes to its close. Our worldwide shipping plan is ready as well.
Manufacture time is estimated at 3-4 months. Delivery worldwide is another 1-2 months. Another month is probably needed to deal with unpredictable problems, so the current estimate is 5-7 months after the campaign ends at November  2018. Of course, we'll try to make the delivery as soon as we can.
We'll make our best during the campaign and after it to keep you updated and let you know about any development.

story:
Air Flix is a fast paced, Second World War, dexterity based dog fighting game for 2 or more players. In an all-action battle of strategy & skill, you will need to outwit and out-flick your opponents to achieve total aerial dominance!

Slick, intuitive game play, multiple game modes & variants combined with components of the highest possible standard, make this the perfect action dog fighting game for both hardened wargamers & casual players alike. 

The Kickstarter collectors edition of Air Flix comes bristling with ultra high quality components, including a massive 3'x3' neoprene play mat, laser etched acrylic discs, highly detailed plane miniatures, thick, plastic coated card stock and custom combat dice.

In addition to the components listed above during the Kickstarter campaign we unlocked 22 stretch goals, including 11 more planes with bases which with will be included in all pledges.

 

 

Supremacy Mode - Duke it out at 30,000 feet in classic "fighter versus fighter" dogfight action. The rules are simple, just shoot down the opposition! The last team standing wins the game.
 

 

Players take it in turns to move their planes around the mat by flicking, ensuring that they only touch the rear of the base within the plane's contact arc. Planes may be rotated within their turning arc, either before the flick, for greater maneuverability, or after, for greater accuracy. 

Planes may not finish their move touching any of the hexes they are in contact with prior to being flicked, ensuring a minimum movement distance. Players may also ask their opponent to "lift" a plane so that they may fly under them.

Once all planes have been moved, shooting is resolved simultaneously. Every plane that has a target within it's firing arc is eligible to shoot. Roll the number of attack dice shown on the pilot card, adding any additional bonus dice gained for short range or rear attacks, with any hit results being subtracted from the target plane's damage points.

The squadron board shows which planes have been moved, any damage sustained, penalties incurred & also the time remaining before reinforcements can be deployed.
 
After all shooting has been resolved, any planes with no damage points remaining are removed from play. If at any point only one player has planes on the map they win the game!
 

 

Blitz Mode -  An asymmetric mode in which one team is trying to bomb key targets on the map, while the other team is doing everything they can to stop them. This mode is played using both fighters and bombers, with only the bombers able to hit the targets.

To hit a bomb site, a Heinkel bomber must be flicked so that its base is at least partially covering one of the bomb site symbols on the map. The Axis forces win the game by hitting a predetermined number of bomb sites, if the bombers are shot down before achieving this, the allies win the day!

Relive the epic tank battle at El Alamein with Annihilation Mode. Both sides use a combination of fighters and bombers to obliterate the opposing player's tanks! 

The El Alamein battle pack contains:

  • The El Alamein 3’ x 3’ battle mat, 
  • 3 Hawker Hurricanes 
  • 3 Junkers Ju 87 (Stukas) 
  • 6 pilot cards 
  • Bombing map & scenario rules for Annihilation Mode.

Be part of one of the pivotal moments of modern military history with Evacuation Mode. Allied forces are desperately trying to get home, with Spitfire squadrons providing cover overhead but quickly running out of fuel, how many lives can they save?  

  • The Dunkirk battle pack contains:  
  • The Dunkirk 3’ x 3’ battle mat 
  • 1 battle damaged Heinkel he 111 
  • 1 fuel tracker board 
  • Bombing map & scenario rules for Evacuation Mode.

Air Flix will be available in 4 different languages: English, French, Spanish and German. We will confirm your choice via the Pledge Manager.

Shipping will be charged after the campaign finishes and will be subsidised for all areas. For UK backers shipping will be charged at £5, EU and USA backers will be charged at £10 and the rest of the world will be £20 (sorry guys). Please be aware that these are estimates & actual prices will be largly dependant on weight. 

We will begin shipping pledges as soon as our copies arrive and we expect to have dispatched all pledges within a month of them arriving. Obviously our time scales are subject to change but we believe we have padded our estimates enough to account for this.

Our products will ship from within the EU so as it stands there will be no import taxes etc for our EU backers. Any and all updates on shipping and production will be posted here as a Project Update for everyone to see.

Risks and challenges

So this is not our first project, we successfully funded and fulfilled Z War One Damnation 2 years ago & since then we have been building solid working relationships with professional, trustworthy suppliers. Over the last couple of years we have also built a solid reputation in manufacturing and prototyping, working alongside many other UK companies on their respective projects.

As with all Kickstarters there is the chance that we may encounter an unforeseen problem, however we feel we have padded our delivery estimates to sufficiently counter this and hope to ship well before the estimated ship date. As we have mentioned in the “Shipping” section any and all updates regarding both production and delivery will be posted as a Backer Update here and be 100% transparent. We’re committed to keeping you all in the loop.
story_txt:
Air Flix is a fast paced, Second World War, dexterity based dog fighting game for 2 or more players. In an all-action battle of strategy & skill, you will need to outwit and out-flick your opponents to achieve total aerial dominance!Slick, intuitive game play, multiple game modes & variants combined with components of the highest possible standard, make this the perfect action dog fighting game for both hardened wargamers & casual players alike. The Kickstarter collectors edition of Air Flix comes bristling with ultra high quality components, including a massive 3'x3' neoprene play mat, laser etched acrylic discs, highly detailed plane miniatures, thick, plastic coated card stock and custom combat dice.In addition to the components listed above during the Kickstarter campaign we unlocked 22 stretch goals, including 11 more planes with bases which with will be included in all pledges. 




 



Supremacy Mode - Duke it out at 30,000 feet in classic "fighter versus fighter" dogfight action. The rules are simple, just shoot down the opposition! The last team standing wins the game.
 

 
Players take it in turns to move their planes around the mat by flicking, ensuring that they only touch the rear of the base within the plane's contact arc. Planes may be rotated within their turning arc, either before the flick, for greater maneuverability, or after, for greater accuracy. 
Planes may not finish their move touching any of the hexes they are in contact with prior to being flicked, ensuring a minimum movement distance. Players may also ask their opponent to "lift" a plane so that they may fly under them.
Once all planes have been moved, shooting is resolved simultaneously. Every plane that has a target within it's firing arc is eligible to shoot. Roll the number of attack dice shown on the pilot card, adding any additional bonus dice gained for short range or rear attacks, with any hit results being subtracted from the target plane's damage points.

The squadron board shows which planes have been moved, any damage sustained, penalties incurred & also the time remaining before reinforcements can be deployed. After all shooting has been resolved, any planes with no damage points remaining are removed from play. If at any point only one player has planes on the map they win the game!  Blitz Mode -  An asymmetric mode in which one team is trying to bomb key targets on the map, while the other team is doing everything they can to stop them. This mode is played using both fighters and bombers, with only the bombers able to hit the targets.To hit a bomb site, a Heinkel bomber must be flicked so that its base is at least partially covering one of the bomb site symbols on the map. The Axis forces win the game by hitting a predetermined number of bomb sites, if the bombers are shot down before achieving this, the allies win the day!Relive the epic tank battle at El Alamein with Annihilation Mode. Both sides use a combination of fighters and bombers to obliterate the opposing player's tanks! The El Alamein battle pack contains:
The El Alamein 3’ x 3’ battle mat, 
3 Hawker Hurricanes 
3 Junkers Ju 87 (Stukas) 
6 pilot cards 
Bombing map & scenario rules for Annihilation Mode.
Be part of one of the pivotal moments of modern military history with Evacuation Mode. Allied forces are desperately trying to get home, with Spitfire squadrons providing cover overhead but quickly running out of fuel, how many lives can they save?  
The Dunkirk battle pack contains:  
The Dunkirk 3’ x 3’ battle mat 
1 battle damaged Heinkel he 111 
1 fuel tracker board 
Bombing map & scenario rules for Evacuation Mode.
Air Flix will be available in 4 different languages: English, French, Spanish and German. We will confirm your choice via the Pledge Manager.Shipping will be charged after the campaign finishes and will be subsidised for all areas. For UK backers shipping will be charged at £5, EU and USA backers will be charged at £10 and the rest of the world will be £20 (sorry guys). Obviously our time scales are subject to change but we believe we have padded our estimates enough to account for this.Our products will ship from within the EU so as it stands there will be no import taxes etc for our EU backers. story:
It all began when we saw this meme:  

We thought: it would rule. So what if we could be these doctors?

Fast forward two years of development and we have this brand new, excruciatingly gory and awesome card game ready for you! “Trust Me, I’m a Doctor!” 

In this hilarious debating game you, as Doctors of the undetermined olde times, attempt to treat each other’s disgusting Ailments with some of the most gruesome and spine-tingling Cures in history, derived from the finest medical science of the age: 

The game is played in real time, with all Doctors presenting and arguing for their Cures to be chosen, even though most of them will be extremely discomforting and, quite frankly, alarming. You'll notice all of the images are from the old times - that's because the treatments and ailments are too! These are real conditions doctors of the past thought people had, and (most disturbingly) genuine procedures they thought would help them. 

If you like awesome weird games with fast-paced and fun debates, interesting art, a historical and educational edge (because these are all REAL treatments and ailments from their time!) and lots of replayability, then this game is perfect for you. 

 

 

This is Half-Monster Games' third major title that we have published, following Animal Empire (funded last year on Kickstarter) and Terrible Candidates (winner of the 2018 Australian Tabletop Game of the Year Award). This game is an excellent extension of the hilarious and engaging party games we've been creating over the last few years. 

 

 We've also thrown in some/ awesome rewards for higher tiers as well, to thank you for being a part of the journey, and because who doesn't love learning and extra information? 

 

 

FAQ: What is this Dr Wiggins' Malady And Dissection Encyclopedia ? 

We did so much research for this game that we have  decided to collect all of our notes into a handmade, limited edition A5 booklet that will reach about 80 pages by the time we've filled out all the entries. We have also asked on the Half-Monster Facebook page for contributions from people who love this era and all the crazy medieval and Victorian medicine that goes on. The encyclopedia will include 126+ entries ranging from goofy paragraphs to 1000 word essays (really! We have one on Excess Bile from a contributor!) on various Ailments, written in the same humorous style as the rest of the game. It really is very funny and can be great both to read, to have to show people, for anyone interested in the history of medicine, and as a series of funny prompts to use while playing the game. 

The cover will be thick and color, and the interior pages black and white. Here is a preview of the book so far.

 

Click to view the Encyclopaedia

FAQ: This game and its contents are extremely gross! Have you no dignity, sir?!

Believe us, we know! Jack actually had to take several breaks while designing it because some of the treatments were quite confronting to research. The comedic edge of the game was amped up to make it less about the gruesome procedures and more about the fun of arguing your way around badly matched Ailments and Cures. We've aimed for a good balance, and through playtesting, we’ve found that folks of all ages find it more squeamish and interesting than uncomfortable or off-putting.

However, if you’d like to try it and see for yourself before pledging, you can have a look at the print and play version we have below. We 100% believe in Try Before You Buy, so please give it a go and let us know what you think!

Trust Me I'm a Doctor Print and Play PDF Download (GDrive) 

 

Thank You to those that helped edit this page!

Dr Crystal, Dr Nick, Dr Tim, Dr Marie, Dr Andrew, Dr Jason, Dr Eleanor, Dr James, Dr Callan, Dr John, Dr Colin, Dr Amanda, Dr Rocco, Dr Wolfram, Dr Brendan, Dr Em, Dr Justin, Dr Bradley, Dr Steve,Dr  Charlotte, Dr Clare, Dr Cassie, Dr Karis, Dr Hugh, Dr Sea Goat, Dr Contessa, Dr Tristan, Dr Zane, Dr Stella, Dr Keith, Dr Amanda, Dr Saira, Dr Brent, Dr Etienne, Dr Patrick, Dr Lynette, Dr Khairul, Dr Alison, Dr Ben, Dr 2D6, Dr Nathan, Dr Tash, Dr Nyxlash

 

Risks and challenges

This game has already funded successfully on Kickstarter and copies are being mailed out all over the world!

story:
Two Sets of Four 28mm Samurai Themed Miniatures for Roleplaying, Wargaming or Collecting.


We are putting together an exciting new range of semi-historical Japanese Samurai figures inspired by a mix of Roleplaying Games, Movies and Mythology for use in role-playing games, wargames and collecting.  This range of metal miniatures will initially be focused on the initial characters of our W.I.P. Rpg, Ronin Hood, but it will also include some fantasy and mythological creatures as well.  Your contributions will help to expand the range much quicker than I could manage relying solely on my own resources.

I am launching this range with a set of Eight Character miniatures sculpted by the Extremely talented Leandro Ventic.  The Characters make perfect RPG Characters or Personalities for your Armies or Collections, and are 28mm measured from top of the head to base of the foot. 


What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to expand the range with yet more Characters and Personalities and Troops, the First 8 Characters have been commissioned and paid for. Your Contribution will help the range grow and expand.





If we exceed our funding goal, we have a few extra surprises for you. 

FREEBIE FOR ALL OUR BACKERS !

As a thank you to all who support our campaign, I'm giving you the Monk !  


ADDITIONS:


The Tengu = £ 6.00


( Set of Three Miniatures, Warrior, Mystic, Temple Guardian )

The Witchhunter, Musician, Wandering Swordsman and Tracker = £ 10.00

The Merchant, Seductress, The Old Tutor, The Archer = £ 10.00


Stretch Goals

£ 1500.00 ( Locked )- The Shugenja


If we reach £1500.00 our first freebie to all who pledge will be the Shugenja Model.

£ 2000.00 ( Locked ) - The Daimyo



If we reach £2000.00 our second freebie to all who pledge will be the Daimyo Model.


What Happens In The Future ?

The successful funding of this project will really help to move things forward with expanding the range by commissioning more miniatures to be sculpted.  Future sets include more interesting and useful characters that are not often found in miniature including; Tax Collectors, Ghost Hunters, Merchants,  Spies.

We will show some of these concept drawings on which these miniatures will be based in the gallery.

We have ideas for other groups, factions and individuals all tied into the backstory and background we are working on.
  • The more interest we get, the quicker we will be able to bring these to life.


Risks & Challenges

The First Eight Miniatures, Ronin and his group and the Governor and his lackeys have already been paid for and a Casting and Mouldmaker Lined up ready to receive them. 

The only possible delays will be if more then initial estimates are needed in which case it should only be a matter of a week or so to get new castings and have them shipped out.


Share the Love !!

Let your friends know about us, post about us, like us, everything you do to get us noticed helps us get closer to the next ideas and concepts and helps us to grow

story:
ABOUT ME AND MY MINIATURES

I'm an artist and graphic designer with a lifelong passion for Dungeons & Dragons and related tabletop role-playing games. I've been creating 2D card stock minis since 2013. What began as a desire to create simple and affordable miniatures to play tabletop war games with my then very young son evolved into an original product line.

My first miniatures were a set of forest-themed human archers and a set of orc adversaries for them to battle. In the years since, under the label Pasiphilo's Paper Minis, I've designed and produced 20 sets of minis for fantasy, modern and cyberpunk-fantasy genres, made commercially available through GamingGeek.ca, Etsy, and in person at games conventions.

This new set of Infernal Humanoid miniatures, with a new design philosophy, is the next stage of evolution.

 

WHY MY CARD STOCK MINIATURES?

My card stock miniatures are for players and game masters who want unique, ready-to-use tabletop RPG miniatures without spending a lot of money on sculpted minis or hours painting them. Similarly, they are for those without the time or patience for downloading, printing out, cutting out and assembling the many PDF paper minis available.

I design all of my commercial sets of miniatures with front and back views and all of my player-character miniatures with male and female variants.

 

DESIGN PHILOSOPHY: SWORD, STEALTH & SPELLFIRE

Fantasy role-playing games like Dungeons & Dragons, and the multitude of similar games inspired by it, have established many different character types to choose from. The core rules of the latest version of D&D, for example, gives players 12 class options, from the mighty Barbarian to the scholarly Wizard. One could argue, however, that each of those character classes are derived from one of three core fantasy archetypes: the Warrior, the Rogue, and the Spellcaster.

The purpose of tabletop gaming miniatures is to represent player characters and adversaries on the tabletop to help visualize the action. My first offering of player-character miniatures included 12 character designs – one for each of the latest D&D classes – paired with the most mechanically complimentary race, and each with male and female variants for a total of 24 figures. These Gender-Variant Player-Character Miniatures satisfy many player-character needs, but cannot cater to all, since between all the classes, races and male/female variants, there are nearly 400 potential combinations.

By designing figures that embody the Warrior, Rogue or Spellcaster, it is my intention that most of the variety of classes can be represented by one of these three core archetypes. I will design these figures, therefore, to hint at different class interpretations so that, for example, the Warrior might equally represent a fighter, a paladin or a cleric – or even a more heavily armoured ranger.

By taking this archetypal design approach, when combined with the most popular races, most class/race combinations can be represented on the tabletop with fewer figure designs overall. This campaign is an attempt to do just that, starting with Infernal Humanoid hybrids, more commonly known as "tieflings" in fantasy RPG lore.

 

WHY INFERNAL HUMANOIDS?

To help me decide which race to begin with, I ran a series of polls on Twitter to help me narrow down the game genre and character race to offer with this campaign. Based on those polls, "medieval-fantasy" "tieflings" won. Thus, the Warrior, Rogue and Spellcaster designs of these figures will incorporate infernal motifs. Future sets, such as elvish Warrior, Rogue and Spellcaster characters, for example, will blend elvish motifs into their designs.

 

WHAT I NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

I'm seeking a minimum of $1,000 CAD to fund this project. That sum covers printing and material costs for 100 sets of miniatures, plus a portion of my time to design, illustrate and produce them. I am the sole creator and will be handling everything myself except for printing and shipping.

Backers of this campaign will receive a set of unique, original-design two-dimensional fantasy tabletop card stock gaming miniatures produced exclusively by me, in my art style, for the TRPG audience. Those opting for the second tier of $20 will receive an additional set of the same miniatures in an alternate colour scheme, available only to backers of this campaign.

This is an all-or-nothing campaign. If I don't reach my funding goal, all funds are returned to the contributors and the project ceases.

 

REGARDING THE DEMO FIGURE DESIGN

The sample artwork of the male warrior is just one possible direction and is shown only to give you an idea of the final design aesthetic. It does not necessarily reflect the final design or colour schemes to be used in the finished product.

story:
Truly Wild Magic is a full color 54 card deck featuring magical effects that occur when a spell doesn't work the way you expect it to. Instead or rolling dice and checking tables you can simply flip over a random card or deal out multiple to your party if everyone is affected all at once! 

-54 poker sized cards with random magical effects with a humorous tone that won't break your game but will add some fun to any situation

-Several cards have custom art work, stretch goals will unlock more art for more of the cards created by hand picked artists that will all provide their own style to the cards

-Universal so that the cards can be used in any game system, just flip over a card when something in your game goes haywire and run with it!

Originally created as replacement rules for the Wild Magic Sorcerer as featured in Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition, we've customized the spell effects to work with any role playing game but included rules specific to that rule set in the included PDF's.

Dead Magic, Broken Magic, Wild Magic... there are many names for what is essentially the same thing. In some places or during certain times magic itself warps and changes. Sometimes it's an area or a place haunted by tragedy, a place where wights and ghouls roam or souls are unable to escape. Maybe it's a place where demon lords have arisen and their gathering has created area's of "spell plague" or Faerzress as they call it in the Underdark. Whatever the case, magic doesn't function the same everywhere all the time. When you want to introduce wild magic into your game just reach for this deck of cards. Detailed inside on the rule cards are some ideas for why or when to include these effects into your game and the included illustrations are cool visuals that just help add to your descriptions.

The entire idea of Truly Wild Magic is to add layer after layer of role playing opportunities for the Players and the Game Master to run with. You try to manipulate fate and cast spells while toying with powers you truly don't understand and accidents sometimes occur. Oops, I grew a beard instead of going invisible. Oops, I'm a flower now but at least the Ogre is laughing instead of trying to smash me. 

You can see where we're going with this. Sit back, grab your deck and hold onto your character sheet...don't forget to pack something that puts out fires though, you just might need it.
story_txt: Truly Wild Magic is a full color 54 card deck featuring magical effects that occur when a spell doesn't work the way you expect it to. Instead or rolling dice and checking tables you can simply flip over a random card or deal out multiple to your party if everyone is affected all at once! -54 poker sized cards with random magical effects with a humorous tone that won't break your game but will add some fun to any situation-Several cards have custom art work, stretch goals will unlock more art for more of the cards created by hand picked artists that will all provide their own style to the cards-Universal so that the cards can be used in any game system, just flip over a card when something in your game goes haywire and run with it!Originally created as replacement rules for the Wild Magic Sorcerer as featured in Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition, we've customized the spell effects to work with any role playing game but included rules specific to that rule set in the included PDF's.Dead Magic, Broken Magic, Wild Magic... there are many names for what is essentially the same thing. In some places or during certain times magic itself warps and changes. Sometimes it's an area or a place haunted by tragedy, a place where wights and ghouls roam or souls are unable to escape. Maybe it's a place where demon lords have arisen and their gathering has created area's of "spell plague" or Faerzress as they call it in the Underdark. Whatever the case, magic doesn't function the same everywhere all the time. When you want to introduce wild magic into your game just reach for this deck of cards. Detailed inside on the rule cards are some ideas for why or when to include these effects into your game and the included illustrations are cool visuals that just help add to your descriptions.The entire idea of Truly Wild Magic is to add layer after layer of role playing opportunities for the Players and the Game Master to run with. You try to manipulate fate and cast spells while toying with powers you truly don't understand and accidents sometimes occur. Oops, I grew a beard instead of going invisible. Oops, I'm a flower now but at least the Ogre is laughing instead of trying to smash me. You can see where we're going with this. Sit back, grab your deck and hold onto your character sheet...don't forget to pack something that puts out fires though, you just might need it.

story:
As a boy I lived with few close neighbors and loads of hard work. Growing up, most of my playmates were in my own head. I spent lifetimes playing as wizards or vampires, slaying dragons or noble knights. I had adventures in worlds no one else has ever seen. As I grew into adulthood I studied as both a scientist and an artist. As a scientist I learned the bitter sweetness of reality. As an artist I was able to let my mind soar. When I became too sick to hold a job I was determined to share the adventures I had grown up in and provide a place where others could visit my worlds. This campaign is all about allowing others to enjoy the excitement and wonder of one of the many worlds I grew up in.

 

For years I have only been able to bring a few people with me as I wrote about my adventures. I have completed five published novels and have already designed, though it is unpublished, a more traditional fantasy RPG that my friends and I have enjoyed for years. Even in the earliest stages, my friends suggested I get it published.

 

Rising Shadows is an extension and refinement of my fantasy setting. Those whom have already played in this system love it, and have encouraged me to work to complete it and get it published. I have come to learn, this is no small task. When playing with friends I can explain the rules they don’t understand and I can use shared experiences to help them see what I am trying to describe. In publishing this, I need to make the world come alive for those who will want to play in it without me there to guide them. That takes time and money. 

 

The world is a rich and proven genre of cyberpunk with heavy elements of fantasy. The success of movies like “Blade Runner” and anime like “Ghost in the Shell” have shown that people have a desire for the genre. Countless books such as “Neuromancer” and “Altered Carbon” have been written in this setting as well. So, the world I have chosen is one people are hungry for. 

 

After more than two decades of playing countless RPGs and designing a system most enjoyed by the few I have been able to play with, I understand that to make a game that will sell it needs to be set in a world people want to play in. The rules need to be open enough to let them play, but restrictive enough to give them a good challenge. The stories and illustrations need to bring the world to life. The most expensive and difficult part for me is the last one.

 

The part that is the most difficult for me is the art work. Gamers like to see illustrations in their books. Great illustrations can make the difference between a gamer picking the game or not. Quality artwork can really cost. 

 

The rules allow for a very involved and open role-play experience. Most systems are focused extensively on combat while only touching lightly on the role-play aspect of the game. Thanks to some very talented voice actors on a channel called Critical Role, playing games like this is becoming much more popular. Players are longing for the opportunity to play a game with the freedom to have fun, even if your Game Master is not professional. This game will allow such freedom and enjoyment of combat and role-play.

 

Writing compelling and immersive stories, I can do. I have already written five very enjoyable novels. Creating a world and original system that covers massive cyber and magic rules as well as balances between giants and goblins is no small task. There are currently plans for 8 manuals each over 200 pages as well as supplements for each area that will come out in time. This takes a lot of time and will require copious amounts of editing, and as I have learned from my five books, good editing is not cheap either.

 

One Hundred percent of your donations and investments will go toward the development  and betterment of this game. The more money we raise the better the artwork will be and the more help I can afford to bring on the team to finish the creation of the game. Though there is no way to truly express how thankful I am for your assistance, I have assigned worthwhile rewards for various amounts invested and even given some of you the opportunity to be a part of the creation of this world and the characters who inhabit it. You will be allowing many others, old and young, to enjoy adventures in this incredible world.

 

An opportunity this exciting should be shared with all your friends. Indigogo has provided tools to help you share this with almost everyone you know. Help spread the word and enhance the success of this venture.

story:
Hi ! 

Pretty much what you see is what it is, big ole rustic style coins, check out the video and i show you how i make them! 

Each made with a copper face on both sides with an alloy of nickle, tin, and zinc in the middle. The coins in your pocket are made of zinc to give you an idea what that metal is like. 

They weigh about 2 oz each, some a tiny bit more and some a tiny bit less but they are all solid and chunky and here they are with a quarter to show scale. 

 Also!

 The campaign runs for 30 days so we can all get together to decide on a final design so make some suggestions! The level of detail i can achieve isn't super fine, you have seen how they are made, but but that lends itself to there rustic nature. We can work it out and come up with something super cool or if you like the design that's on them already that's cool too.

Tell your friends! The more contributions i get, the more awesome i can make the perk! 

Here is a pic so you can see some side thickness. As they are quite thick they don't go "clink" as much as they go "thunk."

 

 

 So what do you get? 

 Two fat coins!

 For this first run of coins its two coins each. I know its not much but this project is to build on my process If all goes well, and it will (I have 5 stars on etsy, not easy to get 5 stars on the internet let me tell you haha, this is me https://www.etsy.com/shop/HammerSteamCrafting?ref=seller-platform-mcnav ) I will be able to give you even more coin for the same price on round two for the next campaign!

So, contribute to round one and you will help yourself to a fat sack of coin in no time! 

Again, the more contributions i get the more coins i can send, its two for now but tell your friends and share and i can add more coin and different designs! 

I will be working on them as contributions come in so i can get them to you as quickly as possible.

 

Bonus Easter egg! 

If you made it this far you deserve extra. I have some pure tin left over from a previous project so for the first 50 or so contributors (that's you hopefully) i'm throwing in two extra tin pennies, that's the two smaller ones on top, and if the project does well i can send some to everyone so tell your friends and share! Im just one guy so you must help me in this. The more contributions i get the more awesome i can make the perks! 

 

Hope you like them! I will be updating daily with new designs as the campaign goes along so check the updates for updates!

story:
Welcome to Verge of War Universe!

Welcome aboard, mateys! Join us as we set course to the not so distant future, year 2232.

Our second Kickstarter campaign seeks to bring two new factions to your tabletops and collections: the  Space Pirates and the godlike Asgars.

Verge Of War: a scalable and balanced miniatures wargame with RPG elements, representing planetary battles in the original Sci-Fi Universe.  About Human and Seit Factions you can read here https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1560931765... or on our website  www.vergeofwar.com  in Lore section 

 

1.“Verge Of War” is a classical wargame with RPG elements.

2. The system is highly scalable, allowing to play both skirmishes and epic battles if players have armies of corresponding sizes.

3. The game uses six-sided dice (or D6), markers, cards and tokens.

 4. A typical game is very dynamic, consists of 6 game rounds and takes about 40-120 minutes depending on the size of the armies.

 5. You won’t just stand and watch during your opponent’s turn! You can react to nearly anything they do.

6. The mechanics of “Verge of War” are easy to learn, but there is a lot of strategy involved in its confrontations. Players will have to think carefully: before the battle begins, a player chooses skills for the army commander from three skill sets representing different strategies, doctrines or military specialties. Each set is divided into 10 levels, which reflect the experience and expertise of your commander.

 7. Players can explore different strategies to find the one that best fits their play style.

 8. The game is well-balanced: it allows to use any combinations of units and win if you apply the right tactics.

 9. The Free Pose Technology allows unlimited variants of poses for your models. One set provides endless pose options for your characters.

 10. Participate in the Verge of War universe development.

All miniatures are supplied unpainted and will require assembly. Shipping in a Verge of War box (one Pledges one box). For your convenience, we remove the parts from the casting molds and deliver the miniature parts prepared for assembly in a package with marking.

We use the most convenient and reliable delivery method. Orders for our buyers in the United States and Canada will be shipped from the logistics center in the United States. European orders will be shipped from Ukraine.  

We ship to all the world. Shipping costs vary depending of your location. 

USA: 10$ / 15$

EU, UK, Canada: 15$ / 20$

Rest of the World: 18$ / 25$       

Expected delivery time:

USA, Canada, Mexico - 1-2 weeks

Europe - 1-2 weeks

Australia - 2-3 weeks. 

Three years ago, we decided to make our own game – one that is fun to play and interesting to create. You will ask why? We’ve been playing tabletop wargames for more than 10 years and we like them as much as you do. But there has always been something missing in the existing systems, so we communicated with numerous players, asking for their opinions. 

We kept the proven wargame classics but created a unique developing universe and added many solutions and mechanics that are not present in any other game. "Verge of War" is a game from players, for players. We create a game for you and with you.

Risks and challenges

We take all the obligations that arise from this campaign very seriously. The quality of our miniatures has been approved by multiple hobbyists and displayed on conventions, our sales experience and customer feedback also confirm it. Game rules have been updated multiple times due to feedback provided by a huge collective of dedicated beta-testers. Production capacity is 400 boxes per month. Shipping cost and terms are based on the analysis of real shipments. 
This is a second Kickstarter campaign. 
We learned a lot. We fulfilled our obligations to the ours backers, shipped all orders. However, each new Kickstarter is a new experience and new challenges before us.Therefore, there may be aspects that we could not foresee. 
We would like to assure all our backers that we will do everything possible to resolve any possible issues immediately. We take an obligation to inform you about all the project news on a regular basis so that you could always have the latest information regarding your investments.

story:
Short Summary

Why support this project?

Look at the image above. These are the DungeonMaster quality standard for all our models. 

Each one is optimized to be printed with as much detail as your printer can handle. FDM or SLA, you will get the best quality!

When backing this project, you get a lot of high-quality models. Each is designed to bring your printing experience to the next level! 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cj4n3s61fhgwwn6/wall%20test_mini_00.stl?dl=0

Download the free test unit to see the surface quality and texture of our models!

The Dungeon Master sacred artifact 

The Kraken's Light tower 

The Bell Tower

The Merlin Tower

Cross-section of the Merlin Tower interior 

The Warrior's Statue

The Demon's Gate

The Old Temple

The Shrine

The Tavern 

The Watch Tower

The Dark Elven Tower

 

1:1 Scale, King's Sword 

You can use this render as your painting reference 

Merlin, The Ultimate Spellcaster bundle

The Extendable wall & Gate

The wall is extendable and can be arranged in different ways as you prefer. You can include the gate or not depending on your game.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Lightening Berserker  

Dungeon Master Dice Tower

The Stargazer (an alternative rooftop for the Merlin Tower)

(The Bronze Pack is an add on option for the Gold Rank reward only)

Dungeon Master Dice Towers (Standard & rubble version)

The Haunted Windmill

You get both versions of the sails (Standard and damaged one) and you can switch between them like Lego blocks.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Kraken

 

The Defense Tower 

There are holes in the Scorpion so that you can have a rope or wire in it.

The Scorpion on top is on a rotating desk.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Shadow Bridge

The bridge is extendable and can be arranged in different ways as you prefer.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Demon Velardes bust

All test prints were done using the exact FDM printer (Ender 5 Pro)
