story:
Metro Morph is a modular building terrain system for 28–32mm tabletop miniature games.

It is an affordable way to quickly and easily fill gaming tables with terrain that is visually striking, strong, and versatile. You don’t need to cut, glue, or paint anything — just open the pack, create the unique structures you want, and start playing within minutes! When you’ve finished your game, Metro Morph can be packed away flat, ready to be reassembled in a totally new configuration for your next game.

Whether you are playing a dungeon-crawler, skirmish battle, or full-blown war-game, the extreme modularity of Metro Morph will meet your needs. Create 2D floor plans, light, multi-storey terrain, or even fully enclosed, line-of-sight-blocking obstacles.

With Metro Morph the choice is yours!


Just a handful of the countless ways to put your Metro Morph kits together

 

The Metro Morph system is made up of two major components.

The card panels which make up the wall, floor and other structural elements of a building and the plastic clips which firmly join these all together.

 

All panels will come on punchboards, ready to be popped out and used

 

This is how simply it all comes together.

 

 

While the Metro Morph system has been designed to be as modular as possible and give you the freedom to create whatever structures you can think of, it also includes a series of PDF blueprints. These give you easy to follow step by step instructions to build a series of predefined structures which will get you to the table even faster.

 

 

Metro Morph is a durable terrain solution which looks great on the tabletop. We achieve this through our simply, yet ingenious sticker system which come with every Core Set and Add-On kit.

 

Sticker sheets come with all Metro Morph kits

Protective Stickers give your card panels an even longer life

Decorative Stickers camouflage the connecting clips into the surrounding graphics


 

The Metro Morph Core Set is the ideal starting point for bringing your wargaming table to life with fantastic looking terrain structures that are designed to withstand the knocks of battle.

This set represents the heart of the Metro Morph system, offering a truly staggering array of potential build options that have been meticulously designed to integrate seamlessly with one another.

 

Core Set Components

 

The initial set carries a sci-fi industrial theme, capturing the atmosphere of a bleak, mechanised world full of grime and very little hope. It’s the perfect location for all your modern sci-fi miniature wargames.

Being highly modular by design, means that the Metro Morph Core-Set can be used to fill gaming tables in a variety of different ways. From smaller single-storey buildings to giant multi-level city blocks, the Core-Set has the flexibility to become the terrain you need for your next game at hand.

 

Examples of different builds made from 1 Core Set (Minus bonus Stretch Goals!)

 

 

Besides the awesome main Perks, additional kits that further expand and enhance the Metro Morph Core Set are available.
 


 

 

DRIVE THRU GAMES

 
BEASTS OF WAR
 
MINIWARGAMING

 

FAEIT 212

http://natfka.blogspot.com/2018/11/metro-morph-table-full-of-terrain-for.html

 


Shipping on all pledges will be charged after the close of the campaign. As we are using a pledge manager to make your purchasing easier, we are able to charge shipping and handling fees based on your postal address rather than an arbitrary amount.

We have striven to keep shipping charges as low as possible, and will continue throughout the campaign to negotiate the best possible deals to pass on to you.



 

With countries indicated there should be no reason to pay additional taxes, VAT charges or custom fees as that cost has been included in the shipping payment. At present our postal estimates* are:
 

* These are initial estimates based off current quotes and may be subject to change by the time of delivery. Additional Add-Ons and stretch goals may further alter this amount based on added weight and size. To be used as a base guide only.

** No additional taxes, VAT, import duties or custom fees will be charged. All are included in this price.

Note: Above prices are indicative for backers who finalise their orders before the close of the pledge manager. Finalising a pledge after the pledge manager’s deadline will incur additional fees. All prices listed in USD.

 

 

Rather than being overly optimistic we have erred on the side of caution with our projected delivery times. Mass manufacturing and shipping more often than not contain unexpected setbacks and delays which can hold a project back by considerable lengths of time. As such, while we can never truly predict the future, these dates are a more realistic guideline we can do best to deliver upon.

 

 

 

Production

While this is Crowd Forge Studio’s first project on such a scale, we feel confident we will be able to deliver the final product both on budget and on time, due to our diligent pre-planning and our tendency to err on the side of caution for our projected timeframes.

We have had great communication with our proposed manufacturer from the earliest stages of design, which has allowed us to plan ahead and circumnavigate most of the common pitfalls inherent in such projects. As a result, the majority of the displayed designs are close to being finalised, only requiring some slight colour modification, final templating and any realignment based off the samples we will receive once pre-production kicks off.

Even so, we have allowed for a fairly long pre-production phase. This gives us time to ensure the quality of the final product, and allows appropriate time to tackle any challenges we meet. This timeline also means we avoid the Lunar New Year celebrations in China, which would otherwise delay our production.

Although it is unlikely, it is possible that we may face issues related to our design templates, e.g. colour selection needing to be altered. While we will endeavour to keep the final product as close to our prototypes as possible, we may have to make some adjustments to accommodate for the process of mass manufacturing. If this is the case we will give you prompt, clear updates so you are totally informed.

Shipping

Shipping cargo from one part of the planet to many other parts is a challenge for any crowdfunding venture in this category. But again, we have planned an over-ample timeframe for shipping, to accommodate both the usual delays and any unexpected circumstances. While we can only give approximations based off our best and current knowledge, we would rather provide later dates and higher estimates than recklessly oversell something.

Communication

We have backed our share of projects, so we know to expect the unexpected. And we understand how crucial it is to maintain open and clear communication with backers throughout the entire process, not only during the initial campaign but up to and beyond final delivery. We want everyone who makes a pledge to have a clear idea of what is happening with the project at any given time, and we want to be accessible to backers who have questions regarding the project.

Terms and Conditions

You acknowledge with your pledge that the final product, as stated above, may differ from that of the initial prototype shown in materials, appearance, and reward contents.

To minimise delays and get accurate estimates for mass production, we must keep strict deadlines. As such you agree that you will confirm your final reward through our pledge manager (see FAQ) on or before its closing time. While we will strive to accommodate later orders/revisions via email up until four weeks after the close of the pledge manager, this will be entirely discretionary on our part and may result in not all rewards being able to be fulfilled. We will contact you by email in regards to the closing of our pledge manager on no fewer than three separate occasions to ensure you have ample notification to confirm your final reward. If we receive no email contact from you within eight weeks of the close of the pledge manager, then you accept that your reward is void.

As gamers who dearly love this project and want to see it helping people to populate their tabletops with awesome terrain, getting this product made and delivered to you is our number one priority. So we will do everything in our power to get your rewards to you as closely as outlined and in as timely a fashion as possible.

By pledging to this project you agree to these terms.

If this is the case we will give you prompt, clear updates so you are totally informed.ShippingShipping cargo from one part of the planet to many other parts is a challenge for any crowdfunding venture in this category. But again, we have planned an over-ample timeframe for shipping, to accommodate both the usual delays and any unexpected circumstances. While we can only give approximations based off our best and current knowledge, we would rather provide later dates and higher estimates than recklessly oversell something.CommunicationWe have backed our share of projects, so we know to expect the unexpected. And we understand how crucial it is to maintain open and clear communication with backers throughout the entire process, not only during the initial campaign but up to and beyond final delivery. We want everyone who makes a pledge to have a clear idea of what is happening with the project at any given time, and we want to be accessible to backers who have questions regarding the project.Terms and ConditionsYou acknowledge with your pledge that the final product, as stated above, may differ from that of the initial prototype shown in materials, appearance, and reward contents.To minimise delays and get accurate estimates for mass production, we must keep strict deadlines. As such you agree that you will confirm your final reward through our pledge manager (see FAQ) on or before its closing time. While we will strive to accommodate later orders/revisions via email up until four weeks after the close of the pledge manager, this will be entirely discretionary on our part and may result in not all rewards being able to be fulfilled. We will contact you by email in regards to the closing of our pledge manager on no fewer than three separate occasions to ensure you have ample notification to confirm your final reward. If we receive no email contact from you within eight weeks of the close of the pledge manager, then you accept that your reward is void.As gamers who dearly love this project and want to see it helping people to populate their tabletops with awesome terrain, getting this product made and delivered to you is our number one priority. So we will do everything in our power to get your rewards to you as closely as outlined and in as timely a fashion as possible.By pledging to this project you agree to these terms.

story:
What ?

  •  The proposed goal is for production of 8 unique sculpts and casts of captive characters in pewter.
  •  12 miniatures, distributed in batch of 4 by size : The Small ones (dwarf, goblin, gnome...), the Medium ones (Human, elf, orc...) and the Jailers (mix of fantasy races)
  • If the campaign goes as planned, we can produce bigger miniatures and consider resin for those (Minotaur, subjugated Troll...). I could extand toward a SF set.
  •  With fixed funding, if we don't reach the goal of the campaign, you get all your money back without any fees.

 

How ?

Like most of my projects, it all starts from a personal need : my dark elves needed some slaves to show off. I couldn't find appropriate ones, so I decided to create them. Like any creative process, the first step is the drawing board and I already have several character designs that were conceived with casting constraints in mind. I already sculpted some of them, and I am in the process of finalising my choice for the other designs.
 

All the miniatures so far :

 


 

How do they size next to each others :



How do they size next to another brand :

 

Risks

 As any campaign, the main risk is delay. I already agreed with a caster that I know produce and deliver in time based in the UK. If need be (main caster impeached or campaign blowing out of proportions) I could contact others actors of the industry based in the UK.
From my previous campaign, I learned the main difficulty lies in collecting the exact amount of miniatures each and one of the backers desires : If everybody fill the pledge manager in time, it would be a huge help.

How can you help ?

If you don't have the means (or the will) to contribute but still want to support the campaign, please share it on social media with a personal note from you. But first and foremost, talk about it around you, with your gaming buddies !
I'll make sure to have a special reward for those of you who make blog or forum post about it.

Je parle français.
Parlo Italiano.

story:
FMP is a brand new company, focused on creating tabletop and roleplaying games. We strive to make our games fun and affordable, so that no gamer feels excluded. Our first project is a miniature wargame called Awakening: Recon, which takes place in a sci-fi setting where races compete for dominion over the galaxy's resources.

As a gaming company we are not only focused on the mechanics of the game but also in its content, So you can expect from us not only fun and addictive games, but compelling back-story and setting development.

We hope you enjoy playing our games as much as we enjoy creating them.

By Gamers, For Gamers.


Awakening: Recon is a miniature game set in our galaxy thousands of years in the future. The Awakening was the arrival of the Ipse to our galaxy, a species completely alien to all of our galaxy's life forms. The races now compete for the ever scarcer resources of the galaxy, sometimes coming into conflict with one another. This is the main focus of the game, the initial skirmishes between the mysterious Ipse, the human coalition of mega corporations called The Consortium, a tribal race of amphibious aliens called the Dagonians, and the hermit Alphas, the remnants of a fallen civilization.


The  galaxy has had many a period of turmoil in it's unending voyage through the cosmos. But none has been more devastating than the one that was precipitated by the Ipse. A race whose sole purpose seems to be the annihilation of life in the cosmos has presented itself, and some of this galaxy's inhabitants are not about to go quietly into oblivion.

The Dagonians, first of the galaxies races to encounter these new foes, are amphibious aliens, who are proud in their millennial traditions of war and combat. They are fierce warriors, but many succumbed to the raw power of this new foe. it was time to regroup and find new systems to colonize and make a stand.

The Consortium, are comprised of mega corporations, that  provide every need to most systems of the civilized galaxy. The new foes described by some outer rim traders seemed ludicrous at best. But the expansion of the Dagonians led to an in depth investigation that proved  The comercial powerhouse to be ill equipped to deal with these new threats.

The Alphas have lived in seclusion for centuries. since the falloff their own civilization, they have retreated to secluded planets, and with their great knowledge of robotics and genetics observed the galaxy, instead of taking an active role in it. The Ipse however threatens to endanger everyone, and the Alphas  are  adept of preventing catastrophes such as the ones themselves suffered.


It's our firm decision to have high quality miniatures that provides to the gammer with detail figures to the more expert painter and easy to paint to the newbie.

Our miniatures will be resin casted and mostly with 44 mm tall, depending in the miniature pose.

We have decided to produce the miniatures in our headquarters in Portugal in order to keep the cost as low as possible and the quality control in high standards.

This is how we presented some of our first masters @ Comic Con:

And here are some of our first resin models that we couldn't resist to paint them:



You can download our alpha version of rules on our webpage. Feel free to leave there all your feedback. We appreciate it a lot! 
Our gammers opinion it's very important for us in FatMan Production, in this way we want your participation in the final definition of the rules.
To play our game you will need to have miniatures that worth 10, 15 or 20 command points 


Every perk has a description of what you will receive as a reward for choosing it. In most of them, you will have to choose among the different packs. At the end of the Indiegogo we will send you an e-mail asking you what options you would like to choose for your Perks. As the campaign progresses new choices will be available. To upgrade your perk you will only have to make an extra contribution adding the difference between the two perks. Go to contribute now and add the amount without choosing any perk. Then let us know in a comment.



These are the type “A” perk available at now. New Type ” A” perks will be available if the stretch goals are achieved.


These are the type “B” perk available at now. New Type ” B” perks will be available if the stretch goals are achieved.


These are the type “C” perk available at now. New Type ”C" perks will be available if the stretch goals are achieved.


These are the type “D” perk available at now. New Type ”D” perks will be available if the stretch goals are achieved.


Game Box - the game box includes everything that the player needs to start enjoying Awakening: Recon. The game box include miniatures that correspond to 6 command points. This perk gives you access to all extra free goals.


Exclusively for Indiegogo you can buy a 2 players bundle to play with your mate for only 99€. This perk gives you access to all extra free goals.


With the Army Bundle you can had more power to your army. This perk gives you access to all extra free goals.


The Collector's Game Box edition is our collection perk that includes:

- Transport case for your army
- Hard cover rule book with detailed history of the game
- Original illustration signed by ours illustrators team. You choose the miniature and one of our illustrators will draw it and sign it.
This perk gives you access to all extra free goals.

Note: The graphics of the box may not be the definitive, our goal is to have the optimal transport box for our game.


Shipping will be charged according to the perk level. To help minimize your costs, we will ship using international hubs. These hubs will then ship all rewards to backers in their region.
Our rough estimation for a Game Box at this time is:
- Europe: 15€
- North America: 15€ 
- Australia: 25€
- Rest of the world: 30€


With this being our first project, many challenges await us. First and foremost we have to ensure that all the modeling and printing are done in time, and our team is ready to start making the remaining models as soon as the campaign proves successful. 

As for the production, we rely on a very skilled and tested caster to make the models, a process he is used to do large quantities, always ensuring the best quality possible.

Finally it is our commitment to you that we will maintain consistent communication throughout the process. This means regular updates, product photos, and plenty of behind the scenes insight as we complete the creation of Awakening: Recon.

story:
We're two dads who are also avid D&D players. We love bringinging new and unique products into the tabletop gaming world.  

We've literally spent thousands of dollars on dice for ourselves - acrylic, aluminum, titanium, custom jobs, dice spinners, and of course our own Tin20 foldable dice (shameless plug!)

Designing your own dice has become really popular, but, let's face it, not everyone wants to start messing around with molds, resins, chemicals, and pressure pots.   Not to mention the cost is quite high when you're just "trying it out." 

We thought, "what if anyone could design and create unique dice, with little investment, regardless of their age or skillset?  What if you could make a unique set of dice for each of your characters for the cost of getting one set from 'those other guys?'"  That's why we made this DIY custom dice making kit that anyone can use.

That's when we came up with Sketch Dice!

In the package are 8 carefully tested permanent paint markers (black, white, blue, red, green, yellow, silver, and gold) and a set of 7 blank polyhedral dice ready for you to unleash your creativity.

You'll also get a fun creative experience that's great for any age and any skill level.  While the inks adhere very well to the surface of the dice it's possible to start again by cleaning them with acetone and a cotton pad.  This means you can reuse them virtually endlessly.

We have thoroughly tested several different types of pigment with different recipes and bases, applying them to different dice materials, and ran them through a variety of situations to test for durability and quality.  

What we ended up with is a fast-drying, long-lasting, durable product that anyone can use.

 

We've tested these with dads, moms, daughters, sons, and all sorts of TTRPG enthusiasts.  You don't need to be an artist to want to make your own dice!

Sketch Dice comes in a beautiful, retail-ready package that looks like you spent a lot of money on it at a hobby store.  You'll be the gift-giver of the year!

These are already being made and we will get them out the door as soon as the campaign closes!

 

To date, with the help of our backers, we have brought about three successful Kickstarters in the TTRPG world:

Dice Spinners - a unique dice alternative

Tin20 - a metal DIY D20 dice puzzle

Perplexing Puzzle Experience - an immersive tabletop gaming experience

 

Risks and challenges

As we know, it's 2020 - a game where anything can happen and the points don't mean anything. Our dice manufacturer and marker manufacturer are confirmed. We are currently completing packaging design so that we can begin creating these as soon as the Kickstarter ends. We do believe, however, that it's more important to get these to you by Christmas, so, if the packaging isn't ready, we will have to send the kits in a less-fancy version of the box to make sure you get them on time.

story:
With a single gesture, your miniature is now ready for another game system. Our patent design can adapt the original base to a new one:

  1. Slide your base in the adapter.
  2. The inner shape of ADAPT ‘EM and its lock prevents it to come off.
  3. Play and enjoy. 
  4. And, if you want to play back old game system, simply remove the base from the adapter.

Remember, only SOLO Ediciones have rights to produce ADAPT ‘EM registered design. You will not find copies or any similar, never. So, don’t think about it and get all you need for your army! Help us to do it possible!

 Sizes are in millimeters (mm).

 

For a explanation on how to use IGG, watch this video: https://youtu.be/2D_mep7-cNk

You can choose perks that contain packs with the quantities you really need: from a little regiment of a dozen soldiers, to a massive army of hundreds of miniatures.

Additionally, if we reach certain stretch goals, we will send you adapters designed for special characters and miniatures.

 

Now, we are proudly to announce we offer worldwide shipping (including Australia, China and South America). The shipping cost is shown during the perk purchase process.

Challenges and success

Players who enjoy having their miniatures bases detailed decorated and painted have been forced to change them, destroying them, by the variations of new game systems and their measures. This need pushed us to give them a simple, quick and cheap solution. This is how our adapters are born.

We have already made a big investment by patenting the design (utility design), which ensures that we are the only company in the market capable of producing or selling this great idea. Now, we need your help to be able to produce it on a scale so that the final price will be ridiculous, and all of you can enjoy them, distributing them to your usual stores, being able to play the system you like without spoiling hours of work and art.

We have successfully financed other projects by other means (eg Canis, el juego de rol de la Fauna Ibérica), and taking advantage of the tools that only Indiegogo give us, we have not hesitated a second to use a platform that is able to reach each and every one of yours against others.

In short, the campaign does not face any risk since everything is contemplated to produce what you decide, want and need.
Do not hesitate and take reward of our adapters at factory price before they reach the stores, always thanks to you.

 

Para una explicación sobre cómo usar IGG, mira este vídeo: https://youtu.be/f3otoQICp88

Con un solo gesto, tus peanas originales ahora corresponden a otro sistema. Nuestro diseño patentado lo hace posible:

  1. Desliza tu peana dentro del adaptador.
  2. La forma de ADAPT 'EM y su tope impiden que se salga.
  3. Juega, disfruta.
  4. Y si quieres volver a jugar a otro sistema, simplemente vuelve a sacar la peana.

Y recuerda, solo nosotros tenemos los derechos de producción del diseño registrado de ADAPT 'EM. No podrás encontrar copias ni nada parecido, nunca. Así que no te lo pienses y ¡hazte con todas las que necesita tu ejército!  ¡Ayúdanos a hacerlo posible!

Medidas en milímetros.

 

Podrás elegir la recompensa que contenga packs con las cantidades de adaptadores que realmente necesites, ni más ni menos: desde un pequeño regimiento de una decena de soldados, hasta un enorme ejército de cientos de miniaturas.

Además, si alcanzamos ciertos objetivos (stretch goals) incluiremos en tu envío adaptadores para personajes y miniaturas especiales.

Medidas en milímetros.

 

En estos momentos, estamos orgullosos de poner anunciar que realizamos envíos internacionales a cualquier parte del mundo (incluidos Australia, China y América del Sur). El coste del envío aparecerá durante el proceso de pago de tu contribución.

 

Desafíos y éxitos

Jugadores que disfrutan de tener sus peanas vistosamente detalladas se han visto obligados a cambiarlas, destrozándolas, por las variaciones de los sistemas de juegos y sus medidas. Ante esta necesidad surgió nuestro compromiso de darles una solución sencilla, rápida y barata. Así nacen nuestros adaptadores.

Ya hemos realizado una gran inversión patentando el diseño (diseño de utilidad), lo que nos asegura ser la única empresa del mercado capaz de producir o vender esta genial idea. Ahora, necesitamos tu ayuda para poder producirla a una escala suficiente para que el precio final sea irrisorio, y todos vosotros podáis disfrutar de ellas, distribuyéndolas a vuestras tiendas habituales, pudiendo jugar al sistema que os apetezca sin echar a perder horas de trabajo y arte.

Hemos financiado con éxito otros proyectos por otros medios (p. e. Canis, el juego de rol de la Fauna Ibérica), y aprovechando las herramientas que solo Indiegogo proporciona, no hemos dudado un segundo en usar una plataforma que es capaz de llegar a todos y cada uno de vosotros frente a otras.

En resumen, la campaña no afronta riesgo alguno ya que todo está contemplado para produciros lo que decidáis, queráis y necesitéis.
No lo dudéis y conseguid como recompensa nuestros adaptadores al coste de fabrica antes de que lleguen a las tiendas, siempre gracias a vosotros.

This need pushed us to give them a simple, quick and cheap solution. This is how our adapters are born.We have already made a big investment by patenting the design (utility design), which ensures that we are the only company in the market capable of producing or selling this great idea. Now, we need your help to be able to produce it on a scale so that the final price will be ridiculous, and all of you can enjoy them, distributing them to your usual stores, being able to play the system you like without spoiling hours of work and art.We have successfully financed other projects by other means (eg Canis, el juego de rol de la Fauna Ibérica), and taking advantage of the tools that only Indiegogo give us, we have not hesitated a second to use a platform that is able to reach each and every one of yours against others.In short, the campaign does not face any risk since everything is contemplated to produce what you decide, want and need.Do not hesitate and take reward of our adapters at factory price before they reach the stores, always thanks to you. Para una explicación sobre cómo usar IGG, mira este vídeo: https://youtu.be/f3otoQICp88Con un solo gesto, tus peanas originales ahora corresponden a otro sistema. Nuestro diseño patentado lo hace posible:
Desliza tu peana dentro del adaptador.
La forma de ADAPT 'EM y su tope impiden que se salga.
Juega, disfruta.
Y si quieres volver a jugar a otro sistema, simplemente vuelve a sacar la peana.
Y recuerda, solo nosotros tenemos los derechos de producción del diseño registrado de ADAPT 'EM. No podrás encontrar copias ni nada parecido, nunca. Así que no te lo pienses y ¡hazte con todas las que necesita tu ejército!  ¡Ayúdanos a hacerlo posible!Medidas en milímetros. Podrás elegir la recompensa que contenga packs con las cantidades de adaptadores que realmente necesites, ni más ni menos: desde un pequeño regimiento de una decena de soldados, hasta un enorme ejército de cientos de miniaturas.Además, si alcanzamos ciertos objetivos (stretch goals) incluiremos en tu envío adaptadores para personajes y miniaturas especiales.Medidas en milímetros. En estos momentos, estamos orgullosos de poner anunciar que realizamos envíos internacionales a cualquier parte del mundo (incluidos Australia, China y América del Sur). El coste del envío aparecerá durante el proceso de pago de tu contribución. Desafíos y éxitosJugadores que disfrutan de tener sus peanas vistosamente detalladas se han visto obligados a cambiarlas, destrozándolas, por las variaciones de los sistemas de juegos y sus medidas. Ante esta necesidad surgió nuestro compromiso de darles una solución sencilla, rápida y barata. Así nacen nuestros adaptadores.Ya hemos realizado una gran inversión patentando el diseño (diseño de utilidad), lo que nos asegura ser la única empresa del mercado capaz de producir o vender esta genial idea. Ahora, necesitamos tu ayuda para poder producirla a una escala suficiente para que el precio final sea irrisorio, y todos vosotros podáis disfrutar de ellas, distribuyéndolas a vuestras tiendas habituales, pudiendo jugar al sistema que os apetezca sin echar a perder horas de trabajo y arte.Hemos financiado con éxito otros proyectos por otros medios (p. e. Canis, el juego de rol de la Fauna Ibérica), y aprovechando las herramientas que solo Indiegogo proporciona, no hemos dudado un segundo en usar una plataforma que es capaz de llegar a todos y cada uno de vosotros frente a otras.En resumen, la campaña no afronta riesgo alguno ya que todo está contemplado para produciros lo que decidáis, queráis y necesitéis.No lo dudéis y conseguid como recompensa nuestros adaptadores al coste de fabrica antes de que lleguen a las tiendas, siempre gracias a vosotros.

story:
Game Overview

The Language of Magic is a deck-building card game which can be played in two ways: 2-player duel – players attempt to build an arsenal of powerful Words of Magic to overcome their opponent, or 2-4 player cooperative or solitary play – players work together to battle the Lich and its minions, defeating it before it can cast its final spell. As a solo or co-op player, you take on the role of the Avatar, chosen heroes of spirituality who are to do battle with the Master of Hythloth, the vile Nefarious Lord Zorhkar and his minions of the abyss.

 There are 26 words of power, each representing their own idea. These words can be combined to make powerful spells to harm, mend, protect, or alter the creatures and the world around you. Some words, the incantations, direct the polarity of the spell. Will you create, negate, or steal? Other words add elemental powers, some can add to or multiply the effect. There are so many possible spells, you will need to play it for yourself to see what you can come up with.

Preliminary rules are posted here.

The project was funded but is now available for Pre-Order.

The project has received a facelift since those photos were taken, check out the graphic below showing the old (top) and the new (bottom), as well as the familiar cover to the rule book.

The Special Accessories

It's not only the game that's available, but it is also the specially themed dice and dice bag that are up for grabs!

The dice bag:

The dice options:

Clear

Purple

Pink and Blue (not the doggie dice)

story:
We expec to have a RTS game for 2021 olympics, the proper game to choose should be released in either 2013 or 2014. And this game should have the credibility and balance to be olypmic competition worthy. For now such a game that might be considered is Command & Conquer: Generals 2 which is due to be released in the middle of 2013. I am confident that this game can compete with its Blizzard counterparts for a possible e-sports 2021 olympic contest, even surpass them. Perhaps Blizzard may release a new version of Starcraft come 2014 or so and it too would be a strong candidate.
More than one franchise can be picked for RTS events, however all of these franchises should have a solid history behind them like Command & Conquer or Blizzard. The importance is that these games should be at least 2 or 3 years old for it to be used frequently in other arenas like ESL and develop its own tactics, playerbase and fanbase. My personal recommendations to nominate for Summer Olympics would be:
1) Command & Conquer: Generals 2
2) Starcraft 3
3) Company of Heroes 2

story:
Shipping

We will ship worldwide. Shipping will be charged after the campaign ends through the pledge manager. Shipping will vary by location and the number of packs ordered. For US orders, backers should anticipate an additional $6-12 for shipping. For international orders, most shipping fees will be $15-30.

***Disclaimer: For International orders, we do the best we can eliminate or reduce the import fees backers have to pay on their rewards. However, in a constantly changing global economy and geo-political environment, these fees can sometimes spring up without warning. Headless Hydra Press is not liable for these fees.

 

Meet the HHP Team:

Headless Hydra Press is a new company owned by me, Shane Collins. Like many people, I lost my job in 2020. Since then, I - along with a team of writers I've known and gamed with for many years (Joe, Ana, and Frank) - have been working hard to make accessories and supplements for tabletop roleplaying games. The current global crisis may have impacted how we play tabletop RPGs, but not why.  TTRPGs are an extremely social experience and we play for the great times we have with family and friends. We aim to create supplements, adventures, and products to enhance that experience.

Moreover, we believe that EVERYONE (not just straight white dudes) love this hobby and we aim to make everyone feel both welcomed and represented by our characters and artwork, something that has not historically been the case in this hobby. When I GM, the most important thing to me is that every player at my table feels like they belong there and that is how we approach our products.

In addition to Hexplorer Magnetic Tile Systems, we publish monthly adventure bundles for Fifth Edition. You can check out our online web shop or visit us at Patreon.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The adventures have all been written, playtested, edited, and formatted. All of the artwork has also been completed. We've run two crowd-funding campaigns successfully, getting backers their rewards ahead of schedule both times - and we intend to do the same here. This will be our first time working with a printing press so the only potential source of delay is related to the printing of the books and potential shipping delays related to COVID-19.

story:
Run for your lives!!! Vikings are coming!!!

Take your Drakkar (dragon-ship) to raid a neighbour village, steal it's treasure and return with it to your town. But danger lurks in these restless waters! You have to be aware of enemy ships and the will of the Gods!!

 

Choose your town, and start sailing to get the treasure. You have enough resources and warriors to reach your destination, but not for the return trip. Each turn consumes one resource. You can put your crew to work and sail faster but it will mean spending more resources and you may end up marooned at sea without food for the rest of the journey.

If you feel lucky you can move to special houses that allow you to draw cards from the deck that can bless your trip or make you wish you stayed back in your town sharpening your axe and sewing your armour. The Gods all have a saying in your endeavour, and they can easily sink your ship or bless you with more warriors and resources. There is even a golden island where you can test your luck twice!!

Stay aware of pirate ships and specially of competing Drakkar ships who will attack you to steal your treasure for themselves.

May the strongest and the sharpest Viking win!

The Gods are watching

The Gods are playing Overfall to exhaustion, so changes in rules may occur until the Gods feel the game is complete. And if they feel more items should be added to the game or improve the quality of others, who are we question?

Stretch Goals

What We Need & What You Get

Share your precious treasure with us on Indiegogo to cover our artist and production costs.

Depending on the size of the treasure we will be upgrading game items to improve your experience, and hopefully turn you into a real viking, with a horned helmet and all (actually the real viking helmets didn't have horns, but they look more fierce with them...).

If you can't add to the treasure chest, you can always help us by sharing this campaign with your friends, family and followers, so that we can give life to this awesome game.

Why pledge now?

  • There is no big publisher behind OVERFALL - The Board Game.
    This game can only be made with your support, now, during the campaign.
  • Help us improve OVERFALL! We have stretch goals to go through that will improve the game for everyone. Now is your chance to make sure the component quality is the best it can be for all.
  • Without you we will not be able to make OVERFALL. We greatly appreciate your pledges and helping us to make this game a reality!

Shipping

There is an additional shipping fee for each game box. Europe will be up to 8€ and for the USA will be up to 15€.

story:
Our main objective is to create a new series of miniature for a fantasy skirmish game that we are developing and if we achieve the necessary funds for the miniatures they will be delivered in May 2014, and the game will have a rough release date at Christmas 2014.
These miniatures can also be used for other games, board games, role games and artistic painting.

Nuestro objetivo principal es crear una nueva serie de miniaturas de género fantástico para un juego de escaramuzas que estamos desarrollando y que con los fondos necesarios las miniaturas serán entregadas en mayo 2014 y el juego tendra una fecha de lanzamiento aproximada para las navidades de 2014.
Estas miniaturas también podrán ser utilizadas para otros juegos de Rol o tablero y para pintura artística.


ABOUT THE GAME:

Aeon Of Eternity is a magical and fantastic world created by Antonio Caballero and Ismael Prieto based on the magic that creates every living soul of all the worlds, fighting to grant the eternity in one being and it is the name that unites the narratives and stories of the first age of the Four Worlds in which the initial background of the campaigns will be based.

We have a web page dedicated to the universe of Aeon Of Eternity where you can find more information, illustrations and where we will reveal the background for the game campaigns until the release in late 2014.

https://www.facebook.com/AeonOfEternity?fref=ts

Besides, we have also created a Facebook group thinking in the community to get feedback about this miniature series and the game itself as it is in development, because your opinion is important.

All project designs are made by the WOLF ART studio and hand drawn by Marta Guisado also know as "Morgathy" and the studio MIRMIDONIA by the digital illustrator Daniel Llinares.

Wolf Art: https://www.facebook.com/wolf.art.3958?fref=ts
Estudio Mirmidonia: https://www.facebook.com/Mirmidonia/app_599788450050788


SOBRE EL JUEGO:
Aeon Of Eternity es un universo mágico y fantástico creado por Antonio Caballero e Ismael Prieto basado en la mágia que genera toda alma viviente entre todos los mundos, luchando por obtener el otorgamiento de la eternidad en un mismo ser y és el nombre que une gran parte de las narraciones e historias del primer Tiempo de los cuatro mundos en el que se basará el trasfondo inicial de las campañas.

Tenemos una página dedicada al universo de Aeon Of Eternity donde poder encontrar más información e ilustraciones y donde se ira desvelando parte de los trasfondos para las campañas del juego hasta la fecha de lanzamiento de 2014.

https://www.facebook.com/AeonOfEternity?fref=ts

A parte, también hemos creado un grupo en facebook pensando en la comunidad para poder dar opinion sobre esta nueva serie de miniaturas y el juego, que al estar en desarollo vuestras opiniones serán bien recibidas.

 https://www.facebook.com/groups/523361417760928/?fref=ts


Todos los diseños de este proyecto están realizados por el estudio WOLF ART de la mano de la ilustradora Marta Guisado alias "Morgathy" y el estudio de MIRMIDONIA como ilustrador digital Daniel Llinares.
Wolf Art: https://www.facebook.com/wolf.art.3958?fref=ts
Mirmidonia estudio: https://www.facebook.com/Mirmidonia/app_599788450050788

Mystical World Miniatures is a registered trademark
and active since 2013. So far we have dedicated carry accessories and elements collection to the world of miniatures.

Currently we have two categories with bases and dioramas
denominated: FANTASY WORLD and FICTION WORLD.

You can find us at  http://mysticalworldminiatures.com/inicio/

and you can join us on our official facebook page https://www.facebook.com/MysticalWorldMiniatures?fref=ts

Mystical World Miniatures és una marca registrada y activa desde mediados
de 2013. Hasta ahora nos dedicamos ha realizar accesorios y elementos de
colección para el mundo de las miniaturas.

Actualmente disponemos de dos categorías con peanas y dioramas
denominadas: FANTASY WORLD y FICTION WORLD.


Puedes encontrarnos en http://mysticalworldminiatures.com/inicio/

 y puedes unirte a nosotros en nuestra página oficial de facebook
https://www.facebook.com/MysticalWorldMiniatures?fref=ts




This is the First Edition of the miniatures of the main characters and monsters based on the first age of the magic universe of "AEON OF ETERNITY". We would like to create as many models as possible.

Four of the eight main characters are already cast in white metal and you can get them as Add-on. The rest of the Main characters and beasts will be in high quality grey resin.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Está és la Primera Edición de miniaturas basada en los personajes principales y monstruos del primer tiempo del universo mágico de "AEON OF ETERNITY". Nos gustaría crear tantas miniaturas como fuera posible.

De los ocho personajes principales cuatro miniaturas ya están fabricadas en metal blanco y las puedes conseguir como ADD ON. El resto de personajes principales y bestiario será en resina gris de alta calidad.




There will be five different sizes: 32mm, 55mm, 70mm, 90mm and 110mm.

-------------------------------

Habrá cinco tamaños diferentes: 32mm, 55mm, 70mm, 90mm y 110mm.

You will also have the opportunity to get as Add On any of the miniatures of this new range at a reduced price to support our campaign as the stretch goals are unlocked.

----------------------------------

También tendrás la oportunidad de conseguir como Add On cualquiera de las miniaturas de esta nueva gama a un precio reducido por apoyar nuestra campaña a medida que se vayan desbloqueando los stretch goals.







REWARDS







PERKS

story:
Welcome to Build It!

The wall building parody board game. Love it or hate it, you'll build it!

 

Build walls to stop the incoming Cargo Trucks!

Or build Ramps!

Cranes!

and Tunnels to get over the wall!

 

 

Created by the Esquivelli Bros!

Two brothers bring you a one of a kind board gaming experience, Build It!

With 25 years of combined experience in graphic design, CAD development, 3D printing, animation, and video editing Andrew and Brian have a solid skill base for product development.

Projects that never reached commercialization include a board game, card game, and table-top game as well as countless mods for video games.

These two companies were instrumental during the prototyping process.

 

What is Build It?

A parody board game about building the wall along the southern border, or, getting right on over it using ramps, cranes, and tunnels. Deliver contraband to sanctuary cities as the Mexico player(s) using cargo trucks. As USA, load agents onto patrol cars and intercept cargo trucks to stop them and build the wall.

Deliver 3 crates to each city, 9 total, as Mexico to win.

Build the wall 3 high all the way across, 24 total, as USA to win. 

 

What's in the box:

Contents

  • 24 Wall Sections
  • 3 Ramps
  • 2 Cranes
  • 1 Tunnel
  • 6 Checkpoints
  • 9 Crate Tokens
  • 6 Key Tokens
  • 8 Vehicle Tokens
  • 128 Cards
  • 2 Dice
  • 1 Game board
  • 1 Rule sheet

 

What the funds will be used for:

We are asking for funds to cover the production run costs of our first short run. Above is a picture of our 3D printed prototype along with various digital 2D cards and board pieces.

Our primary manufacturer, Delano Service, will provide the following

  • Board
  • Cards
  • Cardboard Cutouts
  • Dice
  • Rule sheet
  • Fulfillment

At a price of $22,811, from their facility in Battle Creek, Michigan.

 

Additionally, the plastic injection molded pieces will be provided by our plastic injection specialist, Star Rapid, in Zhongshan, China. They will produce pieces using ABS PA-757 material and P20 CNC milled molds. These parts include the -

  • Wall Sections
  • Ramps
  • Cranes
  • Tunnel
  • Checkpoints

    At a total cost of $14,184 for tooling and $12,716 for parts.

    This is a total of $26,900.

    These parts will be shipped from China to our primary manufacturer and added to the boxes with the rest of the components.

    Manufacturing will come out to a total of $49,711.

    The Indiegogo fee will be approximately $3,000

    An additional $2,500 will be used for any last minute expenditures or fluctuations in market prices effecting both paper and plastic prices for our manufacturers. This will also help cover any overrun.

    This will leave us at a total of $55,000 to get Build It! off the ground.

     

    Risks & Challenges:

    Although our injection molding specialist have pre-flighted the CAD designs for the CNC milled molds, there may be issues when creating the actual parts. This will result in the files being sent back to our injection molding engineer for further refinement. This is a process we have already extensively went through and should not be an issue fixing any problems that arise.

    Created not only by the Esquivelli bros, Build It! has been crafted by a small team of contract artists, print shop providers, an additional CAD engineer. and a musician. These contributors consist of 20+ people supporting the project from all around the world. All of these people will be credited in the final production version.

    To ensure product quality the game has been redesigned twice from the ground up. In the testing process we listened carefully to our players at the meetups and conventions that we attended. We made sure to address the problems that they made clear to us.

     

    Perks:


    Thank you $1

    We thank everyone for their contributions to this project.


    Poster $10

     

    Below are the 10 different options:

     

    1) Small Hands (12"x18")

     

    2) Cargo Truck Poster (12"x18")

     

    3) Patrol Car Poster (12"x18")

     

    4) I'll Build It! Poster (12"x18")

     

    5) I'm Peachy Poster (12"x18")

     

    6) Drain The Swampy Poster (12"x18")

     

    7) At The Crossroads Poster (12"x18")

     

    8) Build It! (12"x18")

     

    9) Full Steam Ahead (12"x18")

     

    10) Feel The Burnie! (18"x12")

     

     

    T-Shirt $20

    Get a Build It! T-Shirt! Has website link www.builditgame.com and #getitbuilt on the back.


    Build It! Board Game $45

    Pre-order your very own copy of the Build It! board game.

    Above is a photo of the back of the box.

     

    Poster 10 Pack $70

    includes all 10 posters!

     

    Yuge Crate $75

    Get a copy of Build It! along with a T-Shirt, Poster and a sticker.

     

    Ultimate Crate $110

    Includes 1 of everything from the campaign including all posters. Does not include anything from collector's edition perk.


    Two Scoops! $140

    Get two of everything in the Yuge Crate.


    Collector's Edition $300

    This special edition includes special box art, 3D printed pieces,  and two 3D printed figurines. 

    Above is a picture of the 3D printed figurines, which are 3D scans of the creators Andrew and Brian.

    Collector's Edition perk also Includes a regular copy of Build It! a T-Shirt and a sticker.

    Along with a Poster 10 pack!

     

    Stretch Goals:

     

    $150,000 - Build It! Video Game Adaptation.

    Early alpha footage from development.

    Utilizing the Unreal 4 Engine we will develop a video game of our board game.

    You will either drive a Cargo Truck or a Patrol Car.

    Race to either deliver crates or intercept them, collect powerups to get an edge over other players.

    By reaching this stretch goal we will be able to hire additional graphic designers, artists, musicians, and programmers to construct the additional assets that will be required.

    These include:

    • Custom 3D models
    • Custom rigging
    • Full soundtrack
    • Animations
    • Detailed levels
    • UI
    • Networking support

     

    $250,000 - Build It! Mobile App Adaptation.

    Utilizing the Unreal 4 Engine we can covert our video game to mobile app.

    By reaching this stretch goal we will be able to hire additional programmers, videogame testers, and network specialists to construct the additional assets that will be required.

    These include:

    • Downsizing for mobile graphics
    • reprogramming controls for game to phone
    • Networking for mobile

     

    $350,000 - More Build It! Collector's Editions.

    By reaching this stretch goal we will be able to build more copies of the collector's edition. These are all 3D printed and 2D digital prints are sourced.

    These include:

    • Making 90 more copies for a total of 100!
    • Hiring fellow 3D printers to help make massive amount of pieces!

     

    $450,000 - Bonus Level for Video Game!

    By reaching this goal we will be able to make an adaptation of the board game in the video game! 

    These include:

    • Custom 3D models
    • Custom rigging
    • additional programming

     

    Love it or hate it, you'll build it!
story_txt:
Welcome to Build It!
The wall building parody board game. Love it or hate it, you'll build it!
 

Build walls to stop the incoming Cargo Trucks!

Or build Ramps!

Cranes!

and Tunnels to get over the wall!
 
 
Created by the Esquivelli Bros!

Two brothers bring you a one of a kind board gaming experience, Build It!
With 25 years of combined experience in graphic design, CAD development, 3D printing, animation, and video editing Andrew and Brian have a solid skill base for product development.
Projects that never reached commercialization include a board game, card game, and table-top game as well as countless mods for video games.
These two companies were instrumental during the prototyping process.

 
What is Build It?

A parody board game about building the wall along the southern border, or, getting right on over it using ramps, cranes, and tunnels. Deliver contraband to sanctuary cities as the Mexico player(s) using cargo trucks. As USA, load agents onto patrol cars and intercept cargo trucks to stop them and build the wall.
Deliver 3 crates to each city, 9 total, as Mexico to win.
Build the wall 3 high all the way across, 24 total, as USA to win. 

 
What's in the box:

24 Wall Sections
3 Ramps

Wall Sections

This will result in the files being sent back to our injection molding engineer for further refinement. This is a process we have already extensively went through and should not be an issue fixing any problems that arise.

To ensure product quality the game has been redesigned twice from the ground up. In the testing process we listened carefully to our players at the meetups and conventions that we attended. We made sure to address the problems that they made clear to us.

story:
DECEPTION PLAYING CARDS

Hi i'm a playing card designer from Turkey and these are Deception playing cards. I have been developing this deck nearly 4 months, and i finally decided to release them to the public.

More Details & What You Get

If this project finish with successful result you will get a top quality air cushion card finish deck which is very smooth and professionally cut out also have deep air pockets to trap air for excellent handling. For more details;

The Deception Playing Cards comes with completely custom black and white back design and custom tuck box. Which is very simplistic and elegant.

The Deception Playing Cards also includes;

1- Four custom designed Aces

2- Custom designed two idenical jokers

3- Classic and elegant faces

4- One double backer card

Risks & Challenges

To be able to make these decks, I need to raise $5000. This is a fixed funding campaign. If the goal of $5000 is not met within 45 days, I won't be able to print the Deception Playing Cards. But don't worry if the project fails you will be refunded after the 45 day period.

Also we make worldwide shipping but in some countries shipping is not free. There's a little shipment fee.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like my playing cards but you can't back me up, you can always support me with following this project's Instagram page :D  

https://www.instagram.com/deceptionplayingcards/

Will this deck have custom faces?
Nope! Aces and Jokers are custom but all number and royalty cards are gonna be standart because i think making magic tricks with standart face cards is much easier.

story:
Note about Diamonds and other digital rewards

Diamonds are the hard currency of the online version of the game. They come for free in both the Basic and Ultimate Set and did not increase the final price of these sets. If you don't play the online game you can ignore them. Diamonds will be given shortly once the campaign finishes! 

This offer is limited only to Android players. Apple doesn't allow to offer digital goods with a code inside the application unfortunately :(

 

 

 

To Mobigame, who has been deeply involved in all steps of this project's development. This Kickstarter would not have been possible without your constant help and input.  

To all the play-testers who helped us test the game thoroughly and make it what it is today. There was a lot of laughs involved in crafting this project, and that's what this game is about!  

To Kirk Dennison and Magnus Karlsson for the great work on proof-reading the V1 of this rulebook (and only you guys know how bad it was! :D)

A particular thank you to Jeremie Torton, game designer of the original video game, and who co-authored this board game, for his patience and resourcefulness.

Thank you as well to Julien Vergonjeanne for his never ending enthusiasm and support throughout this journey. He is working on an up-coming expension for Vikings Gone Wild but still found time to give precious feedback on this game!

Finally, no zombies were harmed in the making of this board game!

story:
What if everyone you know, loved, and remembered are just complex simulations in a computer-generated universe? What if you began to see through the shroud that separates what you think is your life from what is real? What if you wake up from this simulation, only to wonder if you are in another?

Simulation Theory is a Boardgame for 1 to 6 players which combines elements of an escape room and a dungeon delve. The game has 3 major modes for different audiences from casual (17 minutes playtime) to hardcore (2+ hours). Simulation Theory is played with a combination of standees, cards, boards, and Dice. The dice are mainly used for tiebreakers.

Simulation Theory was created by Mark G. Koh (Megacorp), Shawn Siow, and an international team. For the full credits, see team credits below. We put together this Kickstarter campaign because we cannot build this without you.

The base game will include 3 realities, each with 5 unique characters. The 6th character per reality will be available as a stretch goal. Each of these characters has their own strengths and weakness plus a unique backstory which has a real impact in the Ultimate mode (rules and game components will update soon)

Several ways to play

  • Casual mode: Easy to learn and teach, only 15 - 30 mins to play
  • Challenge mode: Additional depth for experienced players, try out a special Scenario
  • Competitive mode: Much more deterministic mode of the game, with fixed treasures and it relies much more on the skill of the players than a lucky topdeck or discovery
  • Ultimate Mode (Stretch goal): A different way to play with branching quests for each character and deterministic gameplay. Directly integrates the story and history of the different Realities together with the gameplay

Congratulations! You guys made it to unlocked "Ultimate mode - Stretch goal". In Ultimate Mode, players need to complete various quests, unique to each Character, to gain treasure and Ascend to the next Reality. Each turn, players also discover part of the story of Simulation Theory and can choose to take different actions towards one of four unique outcomes per Character.  

This mode will take a much longer amount of time to play than the casual or challenge mode – we estimate around 2 hours for a full game with players that are familiar with the other modes of Simulation Theory

Stretch Goal Unlocked : Ultimate Mode

This mode rules assume players are already familiar with the Challenge Mode and Comepetitive Mode rules an the basics of Simulation Theory are assumed here.

SETUP 

  • Choose one reality. Take it's challenge deck. Find and remove the boos card, shuffle the challenge deck. Place the boss card at the center (3,3) position on the 5x5 board and fill out all the other spaces with the challenge cards face-up on the board from top to bottom, starting left to right. 
  • Shuffle both of coordinate decks (column and row) 
  • Take the top card of each coordinate deck - showing a pair of coordinates - row and column. 
  • Randomize the purple generic tokens face down. Take a purple generic token and place it face down (without looking at it) on that position, on top of the card occupying the card at those coordinates. Do this eight times. 
  • Each player chooses a character from the present reality. 
  • Setup each player with their story tracker card on the left hand side of their character card. place the life token on "2" position and the book token on the "1" story node position for each character


FIRST TURN POSITIONS 

During the first turn of ultimate mode, players each take their standee and choose a challenge card which is not surrounded by 4 cards orthogonically (e.g.: has a card above, below, left and right of it) - this is that player's STARTING POSITION. Each player's standee must be at least 2 spaces (horizontally or vertically) away from the next player. Two standees can be diagonally next to each other. All players must agree on their positions before the game commences. Players cannot choose a starting position with a token or standee on it.

TURN SEQUENCE  

There are three parts in each turn, a planning phase, an action phase and a quest phase.

PLANNING PHASE

During the planning phase, all players act simultaneously. Each player chooses which action to perform in this phase:  

-MOVE  

Move the character standee into an adjacent space by specifying coordinates with the dice. The space chosen must be horizontally or vertically next to the standee. A move cannot be made into a diagonal space. Do this by placing the two dice on one of the characters traits on the board (the first to represent a row number and the second to represent a column number.) The character must have an equal or higher trait value to the challenge card in order to move onto it, otherwise they will lose one health. Can move onto challenge cards with a token or another standee (e.g.: another player) on it, if they do  

-REST [recover life]  

If a player has 0 life, this is the only action they may perform The player gains 1 life and may not perform any other actions this turn. To perform a heal action. The player places his dice onto a trait of his choice but with the numbers 6/1

ACTION PHASE  

The action phase happens after all players are ready and reveal their dice placements. Each player who chose to move, moves their standees now. Then each player that chose the heal action, increases their health by one position. If their standee was lying down (0 health), they now place them upright.

-INTERACT/ATTACK

A character that lands on a challenge card with another player/character on it triggers an attack. If a character standee moves into a space with a token on it, this triggers an interaction. Interacting with a PURPLE generic token triggers a story event for that player in the QUEST PHASE -UNLOCK CHARACTER QUEST -

-UNLOCK CHARACTER QUEST

Character Quests can be unlocked when a player moves onto a card which is any one part of a 1-3 card pattern matching a quest unlock pattern that that player has. The player must declare it when it happens when they resolve during the QUEST PHASE

QUEST PHASE During the quest phase players resolve the story items that are triggered due to the course of their actions. 

For PURPLE TOKENS - these tokens are turned number side up. The player then refers to the ultimate mode manual pdf and will look to "Encounter Events" section of that reality and do the actions on encounter events.

For CHARACTER QUESTS: these are the quests that are unlocked and are often narratives from a character's memories/past.

INJURY AND DEATH IN ULTIMATE MODE  

Taking damage: Characters are dealt damage as a consequence of story events or combat. Whenever a character is dealt damage, move their health that number of positions equal the damage to the left of their life track

ASCENSION IN ULTIMATE MODE  

Ascending from the present reality in ultimate mode is the objective of each session. A player that successfully completes any combination of 7 character quests and events will asend. Failing this, the player that enters the 3/3 position after the final boss of the reality is defeated OR if the final event runs out of time (in ACT 4) will ascend.  

THE END OF THE GAME  

Each session of ultimate mode is set in one reality. The players play until one player Ascends and then the session is finished and scores are taken.

SCORING IN ULTIMATE MODE  At the end end of each session, each player counts the the following as their score

1. ascension tokens - the player that ascends receives the gold ascension token and has 20 VP  
2. treasure - the face value of each treasure card collected counts as VP
3. Quests - each quest card has a VP value
4. EVENTS -each major events card has a VP value
5. HEALTH - every point of health a player has at the end of the session converts to 1VP
6. Trait tokens - take the total number of positive trait tokens minus the number of negative trait tokens a character has, this converts to VP 

RETAINING SCORE
Each player should record down their scores for an ultimate mode session. The scores should be cumulative into the next session. Until all available realities are completed, the final winner is the player with the highest total score of all sessions

Basic Gameplay: Casual Mode

This describes fundamental core mechanics only: the game has much more to offer in two other modes

Simultaneous Turns

Planning Phase: Secretly select which card to hit, and which trait to use
Everyone simultaneously reveals their plan

 Action Phase: Compare your stats to the card

  • Miss - Leave the card face up for later
  • Win - Gain a treasure!
  • Lose - Skip the next turn, or discard a treasure


Plan well and you could encounter rival players in the same location to help or hinder.

Ascend through the three Realities

Defeat the boss or find the Exit and wake up in a new Reality. Gain a new Character to face new challenges, or return to your previous Reality with Godlike power.

Ascending

Gain a new character

Fill board with new reality challenge cards

Games End

The game ends after someone ascends from the third Reality

Advanced gameplay : Competitive mode

Download and try the free print and play here.

Try Simulation Theory on Tabletop simulator here.

Note: The game pieces in both the print and play and the tabletop simulator only have rudimentary art instead of the illustrations used for the final production version.

Explore three different realities. Which one is real? Who knows

The Stone  

Legend has it that millennia ago, a star fell from the heavens crashed into the world of Gaeus. It is said that this stone is imbued with such vast power that anyone that touches the stone would perish. Other stories claim that instead of dying from its touch, someone worthy would be able to wield its Godlike power. The stone was thought to be lost but has been rediscovered when a mighty quake cracked the earth asunder, revealing the ancient temple that was built around it. As it is, the primacy of the 8 God Kings is threatened by a warlord immune to their magic, who is also amassing a tremendous horde. Heroes have experienced fevered dreams, brought about by the stone calling to them.

You are one such stoneseeker. You awake disoriented, having lived some other life in a place where magic does not exist and the God-kings do not rule.

The land of Teres, where the stone fell, is now a hotbed of political intrigue, with adventurers and royals alike gambling their lives on reaching the stone first. And through it all, a horrid otherworldly blight twists all life it touches as it spreads unchecked. Will the stone grant you the power to fulfill your wishes?

The Prison  

You awake, wearing a prison jumpsuit and strapped to a Virtual Reality machine. You are deep in the bowels of a black site that officially does not exist; Level 44.

The prison is the infamous Simbulan Penitentiary, located in the city of San Miguel. The prison is privately owned and staffed by sadistic ex-criminal guards and robotic EXA units.

But you are not in any normal cell. The machine you were connected to moments ago should induce Virtual Enhanced Interrogation. The technology is so advanced that the life you just experienced feels more real than the shithole you are now trapped in. None of this is even remotely legal, even by the corrupt standards of San Miguel.

Suddenly the locks on your cell open as a prison riot rages throughout the facility. The supermax inmates have spilled over into the black site, taking over section by section in a murderous rage. Is it too late to escape? Is it too late for answers?

The Ark  

After the near-apocalyptic singularity event on Earth, the newly risen AI's left behind a seemingly benevolent member of their kind, GENECIA. Her intervention veered humanity away from the brink of extinction, by providing them the gift of viable long-distance space travel. A part of that gift is the designs of the Genisis Ark. Like millions of others, you are on one such Ark. Yours is headed toward P4-11, a habitable planet.

You awake in a cryo-pod as one of the privileged few who went on this journey to a new home with their entire body intact. Less important colonists only had their brains transported, awaiting their bodies to be reconstructed when the new world is settled.

The Ark has virtual reality programs to keep the minds of those in stasis active. Your VR sim was strange, almost entirely too real. That, and you were woken too soon. Alarms are blaring, the life support system seems to have been damaged. The ship's AI is mysteriously absent. Where is the captain? Can you save the mission? Can you save yourself?


Designer note: We didn't just 'tack on some lore' for our game - we take storytelling very seriously. The story behind each reality in Simulation Theory is part of the MEGACORP UNIVERSE

  • Tremendous value for just USD 35+ 
  • Under-explored theme (simulation hypothesis)
  • Multiple game modes and high replay value. 
  • Friendly shipping worldwide through our existing Distribution partners*
  • A lot of art - each game piece has unique artwork (not shown in demo playthrough videos) 
  • Deep, compelling lore
  • High-quality components as with our previous games (watch this)
  • It helps the young ecosystem of tabletop games in Southeast Asia

*Distributors:
Asia: Ludus Distributors (Philippines), Animart (Indonesia), VX Global (Singapore), Phantasia games (Taiwan)
Europe: Intrafin (EU, Switzerland & UK)

For first time players and for casual groups with non-gamers, Simulation Theory's casual mode is easy to learn and can be a hit at parties (Yes, we even did demos in public AT parties). Learn the basics here. 

This is a simple 1v1 playthrough in casual mode in a hotel room
Remember that all our playthrough videos use rudimentary placeholder art. Please do not judge the components by what you see here. The standees and the main board components are not shown.

The purpose of these videos is to demonstrate the core mechanics and craftsmanship of STG's game design. The two other game modes (challenge/adventure) build on the knowledge from playing casual mode at least once.

 Challenge mode utilizes the basic rule framework of the game to deliver almost infinite replayability with Challenge scenarios (you can try the ones below with the print and play!). Believe us, it is almost like designing an entirely new game each time.

"Arkfall" - 4 Players - Stone Reality Scenario

 

 "Decontamination Protocol" - 3 players - Prison Reality Scenario

Competitive mode is a much more deterministic mode of the game, with fixed treasures and it relies much more on the skill of the players than a lucky topdeck or discovery. The challenge cards are dealt face up in a 5x5 grid, with the boss card at its center. Ascensions move the boss.

Playthrough video of Competitive mode in Singapore

Many thanks to Lytt Labs for manufacturing the official STG watch! Lytt Labs – DESIGNED IN PARIS, MADE BY MAVERICKS comes with Steel, Aluminum, and high-tech surface finishes. Powered by one of the most reliable automatic engines available. This is the perfect timepiece for STG players as they fight to ascend through the realities.

Some of our rewards feature clothing items: Specifically, T-shirts and the collector's edition hoodie. Other studios may have difficulty integrating this into their logistics, but not us. Alot of our team lives in Southeast asia, and two members of our core team are Indonesian.

We are working with the Casvarel Global Garment Factory who is both a supporter of fair trade and responsible employer.

All perks on Indiegogo had include shipping fee to US/EU/SG/ID/PH. Rest of the world will have shipping fee USD 35.
